We are one of the largest employers in Northampton and we are looking for talented nurses and doctors to join our MDT's and to deliver the best possible care to all of our patients.

If you believe you can make a difference, come and join our team here at Northampton General Hospital NHS Trust.

name: Telemedi - Digital Health Platform & Telehealth Provider
description:
Since 2014, we upskill and provide business with plug&play digital healthcare platform including modules like telemedicine, automated triage, Artificial Intelligence, medical devices monitoring and API integrations. We take into account the expectations of our customers and the specificities of local markets. 
We combine multicultural expertise with the power of technology. Our solutions are used by an ever-growing number of patients across the world.

Taking into account the expectations of our business customers and the specificities of local markets, we offer innovative telemedicine solutions, their implementation, and high-quality services of remote doctor consultations. Our solutions are used by an ever-growing number of patients across the world.

name: Florence
description:
We're the tech behind your team 💜

Florence connects independent nurses and carers directly with care providers to fill their temporary shifts. 

We offer transparency, accountability and simplicity for care home managers looking to ease the pressure of filling staffing gaps. 

Operating across the UK and France we match you to the most relevant nurses, carers and support workers based on location, required skills and reliability for you to choose from. 

Get in contact today to learn more: 020 3911 2555 or email managers@florence.co.uk

name: CHASE
description:
We are a leading provider of outsourced commercial, medical and recruitment services to pharmaceutical, biotech and healthcare companies. We develop solutions that improve the performance of our customers’ brands. We strive to deliver with excellence and ensure that outsourcing with CHASE is easier, simpler and better.

Established in 1997, we’ve grown organically to become the UK’s largest independent in the sector. We’ve maintained our people and client-focused values whilst successfully diversifying to provide a range of commercial and medical solutions to support our customers to maximise the performance of their brands

Our solutions

Customer Engagement
We enhance your customer-facing capabilities with outsourced commercial and medical solutions equipped to thrive in the dynamic UK environment

Collaborative Working
We facilitate partnerships to optimise outcomes for patients, healthcare providers and your brands

Brand Strategy & Management
We power your portfolio for growth with data & insight driven strategic support and outsourced brand management solutions

Permanent Recruitment
We make it easier for you to find the right people for your roles with our industry leading candidate search capabilities

Executive Recruitment
We support you to find exceptional senior permanent and interim talent for key commercial and medical roles

CHASE clinical
We help to accelerate the delivery of clinical trials

Contact us to find out more about solutions for your company and brands.
CHASEpeople.com | connect@chasepeople.com

name: South Central Ambulance Service NHS Foundation Trust
description:
South Central Ambulance Service (SCAS) were the first Ambulance Service to achieve a CQC rating of “Good” and are a top performing ambulance service and a Global Digital Exemplar NHS Trust. We provide 999 emergency services, as well as non-emergency patient transport services (PTS) and NHS 111 services across Berkshire, Buckinghamshire, Hampshire, Oxfordshire, as well as PTS across Surrey and Sussex, serving a total population of 7 million people. 

If you are looking for a rewarding career within a leading NHS Trust please visit www.scasjobs.co.uk to see the full range of opportunties 

Our core values:

Teamwork – delivering high performance through an inclusive, and collaborative approach which values diversity.

Innovation – continuous improvement through empowerment of our people.

Professionalism – setting high standards and delivering what we promise.

Caring – for our patients and each other.

name: Bioiatriki Healthcare Group
description:
Bioiatriki Healthcare Group was founded in 1981 with the vision to bring equal access to high quality healthcare services for everyone.

Since then, it is our everyday mission to look after every person’s special health needs. 

We are a Greek company, which is, today, the leading privately-owned Primary Healthcare Services provider in Greece, consisting of 70 autonomous Diagnostic Centers in Greece and Cyprus, 2 Clinics in Athens and Thessaloniki, 1 International Patient Center, 7 Dental Clinics, 1 Nutrition & Fitness Center and 1 Dermatological Center.

We develop, we innovate and we become better each and every day for the ones that trust us with their health.

Some interesting stats:
- more than 3.000.000 visits per year
- 3.000 highly-qualified employees, 700 of which are specialized doctors and scientists
- 45.000.000€ Investment in technological & medical equipment 
- more than 450.000 people benefited from CSR programs

name: JuniperMD
description: JuniperMD is a leading healthcare technology company offering second-opinion medical consultation and evaluation from world-class physicians in the United States. Through JuniperMD’s own collaboration network, we provide patients with an integrated support system focused on inclusive consultation and evaluation. Facilitating international physician partnership and discussion allows us to evaluate each case comprehensively, ensuring patients are informed of the options available and follow the optimal course of treatment. Our emphasis on multidisciplinary dialogue and collaboration strives to improve the quality of patient care and foster the spread of medical information. JuniperMD has headquarters in New York and Beijing, China, with a Medical Advisory Board and physicians from world-renowned institutions and medical centers.

name: DELBio Inc
description:
DELBio, Member of Delta Group
Consumer Medical | Home Care - Healthcare Medical - Wearable Device
In Vitro Dignostics | Clinical Chemistry - Microbiology Analysis - Test Reagents

name: Dongfang Hospital, Beijing University of Chinese Medicine
description: Dongfang Hospital was officially opened on December 12, 1999. It is the second clinical medical school of Beijing University of Chinese Medicine, a direct managed unit of the State Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine, and a National TCM Clinical Research and Construction Unit. It is a three-level Chinese medicine hospital with complete functions and advanced equipment, integrating medical treatment, teaching, scientific research, prevention and health consultation. It is a hospital affiliated to the Ministry of Education of the Ministry of Education, and a designated hospital of Beijing Medical Insurance.

name: HeyAlly
description:
HeyAlly, a digital initiative by Alliance Healthcare, provides a one-stop care for your entire health continuum. Our mission is to make health & wellness affordable & within reach for you. 

With HeyAlly app, you can easily access to all your healthcare needs:
- Video-consult with our registered health professional and have your medication delivered to your doorstep.
- Shop for your health and wellness services and products on AllyStore.
- Connect to our wide network of over 500 partners clinics and doctors island-wide, which includes General Practitioners, Specialists, Physiotherapy, Traditional Chinese Medicine and more.
- Get latest new and developments on health & wellness.

Since its launch in 2019, HeyAlly has worked with corporate partners to stretch their healthcare dollars with better access to extensive medical solutions for their members.

Healthcare Made Simple, with HeyAlly!
Find out more: https://www.heyally.com/

Be our HeyAlly Partner:
https://www.heyally.com/corporate/

name: Singapore Women's & Children's Medical Group
description:
Singapore Women’s & Children’s Medical Group is one of the leading private medical specialist groups in Singapore focusing on women’s and children’s health.

Our medical specialists are established in strategic locations in Singapore and provide a wide spectrum of medical services across the Obstetrics & Gynaecology and Paediatrics medical specialties.

name: Asia-Pacific Gastroenterology Cancer Summit
description:
APGCS has continuously become a strong educational and networking platform in the Asia Pacific region where we witness strong presentations, lively debates, insightful data and engaging panel discussions covering the latest in GI Cancer Care.

This year, APGCS 2020 will once again assemble key opinion leaders from Asia and across the world for this two-day meeting. Hepatobiliary cancer and gastric cancer, in particular, are often regarded as Asian cancers and we are privileged that the leading lights in these cancers will be on our faculty.

We welcome and invite you to Singapore to be part of this stimulating and educational summit.

name: Scanmed Technology (S) Pte Ltd
description:
Scanmed Technology is Singapore's leading medical equipment distributor, established back in 1993 to provide a range of medical equipment, supplies and services, cater to various health institutions including hospitals, clinics, nursing homes, polyclinics, medical schools and health science authority. 

We are always up-to-date with the latest technology development in the healthcare industry to ensure that our customers get the best solution in the market, and for their patients to get the best possible care. Scanmed Technology provides a variety of medical equipment including diagnostic imaging technology, cardiac monitoring systems, surgical imaging systems, women’s health imaging, biomedical test systems, hospital IT service, point-of-care equipment and various consumables. It always ensures customers’ needs are understood and provides creative, practical and one-stop solutions with products, support and services.

name: Hope Medflight Asia
description:
“It is in the lives that we make a difference in that keeps us growing and going”

HOPE understands that behind every call for assistance, there is a fellow human in need, and a family who cares. Working with our partners and clients in developing care solutions that save lives, our teams go the extra mile to ensure patients are safe and well cared for.

HOPE is owned and managed by healthcare professionals. From our humble beginnings in 2002, we have grown to become the largest and most diverse private emergency medical services provider in Singapore. 

Operating a fleet of over 40 ambulances, Hope provides: 
• Emergency Ambulance services 
• ICU and Advanced Life Support Ambulance Transfers (Singapore & Malaysia)
• Patient Transport Services
• Event Medical Support
• International Medical Assistance
• 24/7 Road, Sea and Air Ambulance

Hope is also a contracted provider of Emergency Ambulance Services operating with the SCDF, as part of Singapore’s 995 national emergency response. 

Our company motto is " WHEN LIFE MATTERS". The team is committed to providing the highest standards of safe and personalised professional medical services, and we pride ourselves in our sense of purpose, professionalism, resourcefulness and teamwork.

name: Prolife Biobank
description:
Prolife Biobank is set to become Asia’s first true Biobank by providing biobanking services such as the collection and preservation of stem cells to the storage of bio specimens such as human tissue and blood. Bank A Tooth, a Singapore incorporated company specialising in dental stem cell banking, is a product of Prolife Biobank. 



Since our establishment in 2012, Prolife Biobank has formed strategic partnerships with various dental practices in Singapore to provide tooth extraction services and to facilitate the transportation of specimens to our laboratory for processing and cryopreservation. This network of dental partners is constantly growing.



Our laboratory which is currently located in Indianapolis, U.S.A, has been operating for over 10 years and specialises in dental stem cell banking and other biobanking products and services, it is FDA-registered and licensed by the departments of health in a number of states, including New York, Indiana and Maryland. In addition, it is CLIA-certified and accredited by the American Association of Blood Banks (AABB). 



At Prolife Biobank, we focus on quality throughout our biobanking processes so that your child's stem cells are successfully collected, safely and securely stored, and available in the best possible condition whenever they are needed.

name: Survival Skills Vietnam
description: Reduce preventable deaths and injuries in Vietnam via first aid education to international standard.

name: Kingston Medical Group
description:
Established in 2017, Kingston Medical Group Pte Ltd is one of the leading Health screening centers for foreign workers in Singapore. 

With the implementation of Antigen Rapid Test (ARTs) and Polymerase Chain Reaction Test (PCR) by the Ministry of Health in Singapore's fight against Covid-19 since 2020, Kingston is able to support and scale the Pre-event Testing(PET), Pre-Departure Test (PDT) and Rostered Routine Testing (RRT) to large group testing (up to 10,000 pax) and at the same time, versatile to provide individual testing at the clinics, home-based premises and even virtual online-supervised testing.

name: Novena Surgery Pte Ltd
description:
Novena Surgery is a medical day surgery facility in Singapore.



Well-equipped modern facilities, personalized services, shorter waiting time, safety and smooth recovery are amongst the reasons patients choose Novena Surgery.



Surgeons and physicians who seek a modern and well-equipped centre will find Novena Surgery to be their day surgery of choice. Equipped with advanced technology set amidst modern facilities, Novena Surgery provides a host of facilities: 3 operating theatres, a minor-operating theatre, a spacious endoscopy suites and comfortable, private recovery suites.



Your care will be provided by our highly skilled and qualified personnel with same day procedures. Our qualified facility and staff are dedicated to creating a warm, personalized environment for you and your family. Novena Surgery will make every effort to assure your visit with us is a pleasant one.



For more information about Novena Surgery, please call our call centre at 6397-7000.

name: Corporeal Health Solutions
description: CHS technology innovations will enable healthcare industry to increase the scales of proactive, predictive diagnosis through virtualization at reduced cost of operations and alleviation of capacity gaps at healthcare providers.

name: DentCare Singapore
description: Dentcare

name: Golden Meditech Holdings Limited（金卫医疗）
description: Golden Meditech Holdings Limited is China's leading integrated-healthcare enterprise. Golden Meditech is a first-mover in China, having established dominant positions in medical devices and healthcare services markets, including cord blood stem cells storage and hospital management, thanks to its strengths in innovation and market expertise and the ability to capture emerging market opportunities. Going forward, the Group will continue to pursue a leading position in China's healthcare industry both through organic growth and strategic expansion.

name: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University
description: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University was founded in 1898. It is a provincial comprehensive tertiary Class A hospital and a provincial designated health care hospital that integrates medical treatment, teaching, scientific research, prevention, health care, and rehabilitation.

name: MuziHealth Consulting
description:
MuziHealth Consulting provides consulting services in healthcare industry in the following areas:



Healthcare strategic management

Healthcare marketing strategy

Investment in healthcare enterprise



Continuing education for leaders in healthcare industry is essential in order for the healthcare organization to progress. MuziHealth Consulting provides training program in the following areas:



Healthcare strategic management

Operations efficiency

Change management

name: SilverConnect
description: GentleFoods® creates moulded puréed food that is familiar, safe and nutritious that helps in stimulating the appetite with the way it looks, tastes and smells, bringing the joy of food back into the lives of people with swallowing difficulties. With continuous inputs from hospitals, clinicians, our very own team of speech therapists, dieticians and chefs to perfect the food that would be both nutritious and appetising. The nurturance, thoughtfulness and committed culture at GentleFoods® aims to bring back the positive and joyous relationship with food.

name: MediCall Assist Travel Solutions Ltd
description: MediCall Assist is a company dedicated to providing high quality services, geared towards the medical and travel business segments in China. As the number of outbound travelers continues to grow in China, there is an ever increasing gap in evacuation and medical coverage to those who are going abroad. MCA has a large pool of local and international resources to help in bridging this gap. MCA possesses the most knowledgeable and experienced professionals in the medical, logistical and consulting fields. MCA provides international students with the medical & security coverage that will make their travels more enjoyable without worrying about the possible emergencies that can happen while traveling abroad.

name: PPP Laser Clinic Vietnam
description: Being a pioneer in introducing Laser & Light Combination System (LLCS) to Vietnam market by Dr. Goh Seng Heng and the Singapore reputable brand, PPP Laser Clinic has created a new wave of aesthetic treatments to solve common skin issue: Pore, Pimples and Pigmentation. With the success achieved through treatment results and brand credibility, PPP has continuously achieved new heights as a leader in Vietnam aesthetic market with regular launching of new treatments and high quality post-laser products and skincare to obtain optimal treatment results within the shortest time

name: Shengguang Group
description:
KN95 Facemask，disposable facemask, medical mask, medical surgical facemask, medical protective facemask in stock and on production plan.

Shengguang group, established in 1993, and it is a specific manufacturer designated by State Food &Drug Administration to produce all kinds of medical devices, manual wheelchair, power wheelchair, rollator, crutches, walking canes, walkers, commode chair, Oxygen concentrator, bathroom accessories and hospital beds. Medical disposables, including disposable medical instruments, disposable consumables, and medical equipments.

Shengguang Group, the professional supplier of all kinds of wheel chair disposable syringes and infusion sets, with more than 10 000 workers including 893 R&D and 346 technicians holding the internal examination qualification certificate issued by the state. In 2014, Shengguang's production capacity is 20.82 million pcs syringes and 8 million pcs infusion set, 1000 wheelchairs, 100 hospital beds Per day. 

All Shengguang's products are approved by ISO9001 2000 quality control system identification, ISO13485 quality control system and CE identification, which is in conformity with GMP standard and advanced testing instruments.
Beside of the syringe factory, SHENGGUANG has three individual factories: SHENXING is to produce wheelchair and hospital beds, JOINKONA, producing disposable consumables, such as surgical drape, gown, gloves…And the last one, RUIDA is to produce thermometer and medical paste.

The products have been sold to 98 countries all of the world, thousands of 40HQ ship Out from our factory.
Shengguang has been authorized to be UN Supplier, from 2012.

name: AMG LIMITED
description: Arrow Medsource Group is a comprehensive, end to end strategic supply chain partner. Utilizing expertise in supply chain improvement and contract manufacturing, we deliver meaningful cost savings and improve supply chain efficiency.

name: FlyforSurgery
description:
FlyforSurgery - The Smarter Way to Healthcare!



FlyForSurgery is a consultant to individuals and organizations seeking cost effective medical solutions. Due to disparities in the cost of medical care in different countries, FlyForSurgery is able to design solutions for its clients which make the best of use of their money - often saving them upto 80% of total costs compared to their own country, while providing world class standards of healthcare.



FlyforSurgery has partnerships with India's most respected hospitals located in 26 cities, including New Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, and Chennai. All facilitation services are provided free of cost to the patient except some optional premium services.



Our Services:



Consulting Services -



FlyForSurgery provides consultancy services to help choose hospitals and doctors best suited for your needs. Our friendly consultant will help answer all your queries regarding the trip and help you choose the most cost effective surgery proposition whilst ensuring top quality treatments.



Concierge Services -



FlyForSurgery takes pride in providing you with complete peace of mind throughout your visit. Your dedicated case manager will book your flights and hotels, ensure special treatment in hospital premises and design a post surgery tourism itinerary.



Medical Records Transfer -



FlyForSurgery ensures safe electronic transfer of your past medical records to your doctor in the overseas location in order to facilitate a better understanding of the required surgery even before your arrival in the destination country.



Communication Services -



FlyForSurgery provides an array of communication services including pre-arrival and post procedure consultation from your surgeon. We also facilitate communication between your destination and home doctor.

name: SLD Care
description: SLD, senior-care focused brand, premium senior care equipment manufacturer and trader, offering premium quality and user-experience goods.

name: Active Aging LLP (Singapore Pressalit)
description:
ACTIVE AGING LLP, is a 100% Singapore enterprise, dedicated to enabling seniors and the disabled, to ‘keep living’ well, independently and healthily, with grace and dignity.



As PRESSALIT’s Authorized Distributor for Singapore, ACTIVE AGING LLP carries a wide range of PRESSALIT products, designed and engineered for people with reduced functional capacity; that are used in bathrooms, kitchens and workspaces.



PRESSALIT, with a history that dates back to 1954, is a leading manufacturer of toilet seats and flexible solutions for kitchens and bathrooms. PRESSALIT products are now proudly available through ACTIVE AGING LLP in Singapore.



Join us in our journey to adding life to years. Safely. Securely. With absolute peace of mind.



Vision

A society where the aged and disabled can continue enjoying high mental, physical and emotional function in their daily lives; and to be able to do so sustainably, and where living/aging independently and actively is a given and an individual’s right.



Mission

To harness technology, engineering and innovative design to bring only superior quality, safe, secure and tested products that add life to years.

To partner healthcare institutions in improving their quality of care.

To commit to partnerships that promote and support healthy, active and independent living in the aged and PwDs

name: Feti'a assistance
description: Feti'a assistance provides 24/7 medical and non medical assistance services in Asia. We also act as a Third Party Administrator (TPA) for insurers. Our team has been providing emergency evacuation services in the region since 2010. Headquartered in Singapore, our network comprises Cambodia, Myanmar and Laos, three countries in which the access of quality medical care is difficult and thus requiring real flexibility, high professionalism and creativity.

name: The Harley Street Vascular
description: The Harley Street Vascular Centre specialises in diagnosing, treating and managing a range of conditions related to veins and arteries like varicose veins, deep vein thrombosis, aortic aneurysms, peripheral arterial disease, pelvic congestion syndrome and erectile dysfunction.

name: Henan Kangdi Medical Device Co.,Ltd
description: Henan Kangdi has 26 years experience,provide capsicum plaster,pain relief patch,cooling gel patch,body warm patch,slim patch,detox foot patch,nasal strips,foot corn plaster, mosquito repellent wristband,diarrhea patch,we provide OEM,ODM service.

name: Wellness Lifestyle & Health Group
description:
Wellness Lifestyle & Health Group is a Singapore based company that provides medical services with the goal of preventing disease and enhancing personal wellness through specialist crafted health screenings and actionable programs. 

Located at Camden Medical Centre, our beautifully designed WL&H Medical Clinic combines a General Practitioner Clinic with select Specialist Practices (such as Cardiology) to not only meet our client’s basic medical needs, but to also provide them with expert specialist care.

name: Intellimed Healthcare
description: Singapore based company specialized in the commercialization of Healthcare AI, digital health and innovative medical devices focussed on ASEAN markets (Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, Philippines, Brunei, Cambodia). Exclusive distributor for products in Cardiology, Respiratory, Oncology, Gastro, Neuro & Oncology.

name: Neu Industries Pte Ltd
description: NEU Industries Pte Ltd is a leading distributor and service provider of Healthcare, Infection Control and Life Science products for Hospitals, Nursing Homes and Pharmaceutical companies.

name: TigerText Pte Ltd
description:
TigerConnect is healthcare’s most widely adopted communication platform – uniquely modernising care collaboration among doctors, nurses, patients, and care teams. TigerConnect is the only solution that combines a consumer-like user experience for text, video, and voice communication with the serious security, privacy, and clinical workflow requirements that today’s healthcare organisations demand. TigerConnect accelerates productivity, reduces costs, and improves patient outcomes. 

Trusted by more than 5,000 international healthcare organisations, TigerConnect maintains 99.99% verifiable uptime and processes more than 10 million messages each day.

name: 益富Efione
description:
NutritecEnjoy is the no. 1 medical nutrition product and solution company in Taiwan. The company develops and distributes clinically proven nutrition products for people with specific dietary needs related to illnesses, disease states or the special challenges of different life stages. The products are distributed through medical institutions (hospitals, long-term care centers) and retail (ie. pharmacies, specialty stores). 

Nutritec nutritional products are served in over 92% of hospitals and 400+ nursing organizations in Taiwan. On average, more than 200,000 people in Taiwan uses Nutritec formulas daily.

In addition to products, the company provides nutrition advisory services and food services to medical institutions and operates the largest team of registered dietitian in Taiwan through Nutritec-Enjoy Nutrition Center (NENC), a wholly owned subsidiary of Nutritec. 

Through collaborations with academic and medical institutions, the company continues to conduct research and clinical studies to further improve its products and enhance its services.

name: Care Visions China
description:
Care Visions China is a subsidiary of Care Visions Group (UK), providing professional home based therapy in China. Care Visions Group is the UK’s leading integrated home care group in the world, we have a total of more than 1,000 skilled nursing, physical therapists, and counselors.



Care Visions adhere's to the person-centred service concept, thus in our staff training process, we focus on the continuous improvement of our service team, by providing professional care in line with the needs of patients and their families.



Our Services



At Care Visions China, we pride ourselves with the delivery of high quality care and support to our clients who are living with dementia. We are robustly evolving in the varied specialist areas within the care services team in China. 

Our services include ; 

- In-home non-pharmacological dementia interventions that help to reduce behavioral and psychological symptoms of dementia (BPSD).

- Group dementia therapies that encourage socialization while reducing BPSD.

- FREE online training classes via our WeChat channel. These classes are taught weekly in mandarin (Chinese) and focuses on educating the people of China on dementia.

- Online consultations, because here at Care Visions, we understand your time is valuable and you may need help over the phone or via email. 



These services are delivered by our very experienced team in the comfort of the patients'​ own homes or locations convenient to get to. 



Our Staff



Being in the healthcare service industry, “PEOPLE” has always been the greatest asset in our organisation. We work hard to provide a happy, harmonious and family-oriented working environment. We strive to offer the best staff benefits, welfare and training programs to all our employees. In our continuous effort to provide quality home based therapy services to our patients, we are always seeking highly committed, motivated and dynamic individuals to join our big family.

name: Wellchem Pharmaceuticals
description:
Wellchem Pharmaceuticals was established in 1975. Headquartered in Singapore, with a rich history of almost 50 years, we are one of the pioneering pharmaceutical companies in Singapore and growing from strength to strength, year to year.

Wellchem is blessed to have a team of very dedicated and passionate individuals who are experts in various fields. Amongst us are regulatory pharmacists, marketing and sales management, logistics and finance personnel who each have decades of working experience in various pharmaceutical companies.

Our specialties include orthopedics, biologics, radiation oncology, vitamins, oral supplements, consumer products like cough and cold supplements and probiotics, ophthalmology products, medical disposables such as masks and gloves which are used in most major hospitals.

name: Distinct HealthCare
description:
Distinct HealthCare is a physician-led medical group dedicated to providing high quality medicalservices for both expatriates and local Chinese families. 

We operate 20+ multi-specialty clinics in Beijing, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Chongqing, Chengdu, Changsha, Suzhou, Ningbo, and Hong Kong, which offer a wide range of clinical services, including general medicine, internal medicine, obstetrics & gynecology, pediatrics, dental care, dermatology, ophthalmology, physiotherapy and outpatient surgery. 

All of our physicians graduated from China’s top medical schools, and over half of them have overseas training or work experience. Our cutting-edge medical capabilities and our dedication to patient service maximize our patients’ health benefits. Our physicians and staff are capable of communicating in Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean and other foreign languages. We accept direct billing with over forty global medical insurance companies.

name: Lifeline Corporation Pte Ltd
description: Lifeline Corporation Pte Ltd has built a reputation for supplying quality healthcare products at affordable prices coupled with responsive service. Lifeline has a wide range of rehabilitation products including wheelchairs, hospital furniture and other patient support aids. With the success in Singapore, we expanded to Malaysia in 1995 with the same vision to provide customers with their healthcare needs and the aged a better quality of life.

name: Central Region Trauma Services
description:
Initiated in 2019, the Central Region Trauma Services (CRTS) is served by multi-disciplinary trauma teams spanned across the healthcare clusters and system, namely, Tan Tock Seng Hospital (TTSH), Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (KTPH), Sengkang General Hospital (SKH), KK Womens' and Children's Hospital (KKH), Raffles Hospital (RH) and the upcoming Woodlands Health (WH).

Ensuring the best of care for patients who require neurosurgical treatment, the CRTS is also supported by the National Neuroscience Institute (NNI).

Noting that care continuum starts even before the patients arrive at the hospital, we work closely with the Singapore Civil Defence Force (SCDF) and the Singapore Armed Forces (SAF) in the implementation of national initiatives.

name: NewLife Vietnam Medical Jsc.
description:
NewLife Vietnam Medical is a healthcare service company based in Hanoi (Vietnam). We are striving to become the leading company that provides state-of-the-art, quality and sustainable medical care solutions, with a focus on oncology in Vietnam and the region. NewLife Vietnam Medical is implementing two major projects: a NewLife cancer clinic in Hanoi (to be open in April 2010) and a NewLife hospital complex in Bac Ninh (the first component is tentatively open in 2011). Our institutions will be operating under the medical direction of Prof. Dr. Gerrit Stoter, former Head of Medical Oncology Department, Erasmus University Medical Center (Rotterdam, The Netherlands). 



For more information please refer to www.newlifevietnam.com.

name: Shenzhen Juding Medical Co., Ltd.
description:
JUDcare-Infection Prevention & Control Solutions Provider.
JUDcare is one of the leading high-tech enterprise in the field of smart medical and healthcare solutions. Judcare possesses a complete R&D,marketing, and service network with more than 1,400 employees, we provide services for more than 3,500 hospitals across China and over 50 countries&regions all over the world.

name: MUNICIPAL WAN FANG HOSPITAL
description: MUNICIPAL WAN FANG HOSPITAL is a 732 beds hospital located in Taipei, Taiwan. It is owned by Taipei city government but operated, since it was opened in 1997, by Taipei Medical University as one of the three major teaching hospitals of the university.

name: The People's Hospital of Jimo Qingdao
description: The People's Hospital of Jimo Qingdao, founded in 1949, is a comprehensive tertiary hospital integrating medical, scientific research, teaching, health care and prevention functions, with certain scientific research strength and teaching teachers.

name: Medsential LLC
description:
Medsential LLC is a US FDA registered company that develops, manufactures, and distributes a broad range of medical products to customers. Established in 2005, Medsential is an ISO certified medical device company with the capabilities to manufacture and assemble a broad range of products. Medsential has an extensive distribution channel, salesforce, engineering platform, and production team to bring quality products to global markets. 
We also work with partner companies to provide clinical trial tests, distribution, manufacturing, and assembly.

name: University of Medicine Pham Ngoc Thach
description:
The University of Medicine Pham Ngoc Thach (UPNT) was established on July 1st 2008 on the basis of the University Training Center (UTC) for Healthcare Professionals in HCM city.

Since the early days of its foundation in 1989, the UTC has been assigned as a university of medicine in Ho Chi Minh city. During the past twenty-year of development, the UTC, as its previous name prior to 2008 and the UPNT as its current name, has successfully completed 14 full-time regular training courses, including 1422 general practitioners who have actively taken part in the city’s healthcare system. Additionally, the University has provided more than 8000 nurses and 500 primary healthcare physicians (four-year on-the-job training course), strengthening the healthcare resources for remote and distant areas in the South of Vietnam (from Da Nang city to Southern provinces). The University's achievements are highly appreciated by the social community. As evidenced by each year, the University receives a considerable number of task requirements from the City’s and Central Government’s healthcare institutions located in the city, which are five- and four-folds higher than the actual number of graduated doctors and nurses, respectively. Furthermore, graduate courses and continuous medical education are regularly organized for thousands of medical specialists in various disciplines (medical imaging, anesthesiology, ENT…)

The UPNT is a public university in the national education system of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, which is founded according to the Prime Minister’s Decision. The University is under direct administrative management of the HCM city People’s Committee and under the expertise management of the Ministry of Health and Ministry of Education and Training.

name: Medical Billing Wholesalers
description:
Revenue Cycle Management

We are an analytics-driven, technology-enabled Revenue Cycle Management ("RCM"​) Company providing medical billing, medical coding and business analytics services to leading US RCM companies.

• Track record of over 7 years – maintaining and growing with our clients 
• MBW has grown from 5 employees to over 700 employees and 4 offices 
• Multi-specialty expertise with proficiency using various EHR/PM systems
• Our Clients appreciate our rapid turnaround time and our communication protocols
• Our processes free up your time from day-to-day operations and lets you spend more time servicing existing clients and bringing in new clients
• No worries about Turnover, hiring & training staff – MBW will do it for you
• Retraining your staff and adding a new biller or coder is as easy as sending us an email or giving us a call

name: CARE Hospitals, Quality CARE India Limited
description:
CARE Hospitals Group is a multi-specialty healthcare provider operating 16 healthcare facilities serving 8 cities across 6 states in India. The network has its presence in Hyderabad, Bhubaneswar, Vishakhapatnam, Raipur, Nagpur, Pune, Indore & Aurangabad. A regional leader in South and Central India and counted among the top 5 pan-Indian hospital chains, CARE Hospitals delivers comprehensive care in over 30 clinical specialties, with over 2650+ beds. 

Presently CARE Hospitals operates under the aegis of the Evercare Group, an impact-driven healthcare network extending its services across South Asia and Africa.

name: Valence Health (now Evolent Health)
description:
**Evolent Health, Inc., acquired Valence Health, LLC, on October 16, 2016.**

To connect with Evolent Health on LinkedIn, visit https://www.linkedin.com/company/evolent-health/

name: Kauvery Hospital
description:
Kauvery Hospitals a leading global, multispecialty World Class Hospital, focuses on Patient care, Patient safety and Patient satisfaction. Our Medical and Non-medical staff in our 1200+ bed hospital, unite at the "Centers of Excellence,"​ at each location, to bring together healthcare professionals and state-of-the-art medical technology to serve communities across the globe.

In keeping with our vision and consistent commitment, and sustained by our mission, Kauvery Hospital has been delivering preeminent medical care, setting world class standards. Our sophisticated and therapeutic care extends to all specialties and sub-specialties of medicine and surgery. Located in the heart of Trichy (Tennur, Royal Road and Alexandria Road (Cantonment), Chennai, Hosur Salem and Bengaluru the hospital also renders adult and pediatric trauma care.

Kauvery Hospital is globally known for its multidisciplinary services at all its Centers of Excellence, and for its comprehensive, Avant-Grade technology, especially in diagnostics and remedial care in heart diseases, transplantation, vascular and neurosciences medicine

name: Metropolis Healthcare
description:
We believe that every human being deserves to know the truth about their inner health.

We are Metropolis - Your Pathology Specialist, delivering millions of tests every year while catering to so many patients, leading laboratories, Hospitals, Nursing homes and 2,00,000 doctors. With over 35 years of experience in delivering accurate reports, Metropolis has earned the reputation of being India's most respected and only multinational chain of diagnostic centres with presence in UAE, Sri Lanka, South Africa, Kenya, Mauritius and Ghana. 

Metropolis follows a rigorous 8-Stage MET Protocol that ensures the most comprehensive testing for accurate and reliable reports. Metropolis offers diagnostic and wellness services like Blood tests, Clinical Trials, Hospital Lab Management, Home Health Services, Preventive Health Check-ups and Corporate & Wellness Solutions. 

Metropolis is at the forefront in adopting cutting edge technologies and services that cater to patients needs. Driven to make a difference and provide quality & affordable services to our consumers we have a wide network that includes 115+ state-of-art Laboratories across India with over 1500 collection centres, processing over 4000 varieties of tests and supported by an efficient team of more than 4500 people. 

Today, we are one of the few laboratories that has received the CAP (College of American Pathologists), accreditation, the global gold standard in Laboratory Accreditation. Most of our laboratories in India have received the NABL Accreditation (National Accreditation Board for testing and Calibration Laboratories). In addition, the central laboratory in Mumbai also adheres to CLIA (Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments) program and also follows the guidelines laid by GCP and GLP. Our unit in South Africa is accredited by SANAS (South African National Accreditation System is the only accreditation body approved by South African Government).

name: Rumah Sakit Pondok Indah Group
description:
RS Pondok Indah Group was established in 1986 with RS Pondok Indah – Pondok Indah as its first hospital. To reach out to more people in Jakarta and its vicinity, RS Pondok Indah Group then opened its two more RS Pondok Indah hospitals: RS Pondok Indah – Puri Indah in 2008 and RS Pondok Indah – Bintaro Jaya in 2017.

All of the RS Pondok Indah hospitals implement a patient-centered approach that encapsulates our service and healthcare facilities. These are nonetheless aims to deliver the best health services in the most favorable manner based on the Good Corporate Governance and Good Clinical Government principles.

name: Cloverleaf Care
description:
At Cloverleaf Care we believe in promoting independence and quality of life for seniors and adults with special needs by providing a) Non-medical care in your home b) Aging in place services and c) Education and advisory services to help you prepare, plan and Thrive! in place.

We recognize the unique needs of the diverse senior demographics, that span from supportive services to total hands-on care services. Our industry leading care programs are designed with flexibility as a central theme, and customized for each client.

name: Syft Corp (a GHX company)
description: Syft® enables enterprise-wide inventory management through a powerful combination of services, automation tools, and real-time data analytics. The comprehensive Syft Synergy® platform eliminates the need for multiple point solutions and facilitates immediate supply savings with a range of capabilities including master data management, inventory services, supply chain management software, analytics, and advanced reporting. Founded in 1999, Syft is used by more than 245 customers (970 U.S. hospitals) to control costs, processes, and productivity across the entire organization.

name: SpectraMedix
description:
In today’s performance driven healthcare landscape, the path to quality improvement begins with clinical data. SpectraMedix partners with your healthcare organization to transform real-time and retrospective data into measureable clinical and financial results. Our tailored clinical analytics solutions provide actionable information that makes it easy for your organization to begin and accelerate quality improvement initiatives, increase revenues and maximize incentives for the range of performance-based Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) programs.



In 2012, SpectraMedix was selected as one of eight companies for the inaugural class of the New York Digital Health Accelerator Program and named BEST Healthcare/IT Company 2012 at the New Jersey Technology Council (NJTC) Venture Conference.



"You can't manage what you can't measure."​ - W. Edwards Deming

name: Paras Healthcare Pvt. Ltd.
description:
Paras Healthcare was established in 2006, with the mission of providing specialized tertiary medical care services at affordable prices. The company has a unique healthcare delivery model based on the three principles that define its values Accessibility, Affordability and Quality. Paras stands apart as a healthcare provider in its vision of making healthcare for all a reality for the common man in rural and remote regions. Paras Healthcare at present has 730 beds under Paras Hospitals and Paras Bliss. The group is projected to have a bed strength of 1500 and have a group revenue of more than 1000 crores in the next 5 years. Group of Hospitals: Gurgaon, Patna, Darbhanga, New Delhi and Panchkula
Company Website: 
Paras Hospitals - http://www.parashospitals.com/

name: Vardhan Medical Coding Private Limited®
description:
Vardhan Medical Coding Private Limited, Partners with hospitals, physicians, and healthcare providers to help their business succeed and develops customized solutions that reduce the overall cost to collect while accelerating their cash flow and creating a thriving operational environment compliant with the healthcare industry regulations.

Vardhan Medical Coding (VMC) operates on a set of guiding principles that drive its high-performance culture and requires its people to operate with the highest standards of integrity in their relationships with customers, people, and business associates.
It has been embracing technology and adopting solutions that will increase its efficiency and productivity, thereby delivering remarkable results.
With the combined expertise of seasoned professionals and sophisticated tools, Vardhan Medical Coding Private Limited delivers dramatic changes to the client's revenue cycle outcomes.
Vardhan Medical Coding Private Limited takes advantage of a powerful workflow engine, knowledge management system, a slew of productivity-enhancing tools, and business intelligence technology that gives its clients a clear view of revenue cycle performance metrics.
Please visit for more info: www.thevmcs.com 

LEADERSHIP:
Founded by a team of experts who have built and managed some of the largest healthcare business process services operations in the world, Vardhan Medical Coding Private Limited is conversant with the complexities of healthcare regulation, state-specific laws, and most of the commercially available systems.

name: Hinduja Hospital
description:
We are a well-known professional multi-specialty tertiary care hospital in Mumbai, making a mark since 1951.



Mission

Quality Healthcare for All



Description

P.D.Hinduja Hospital, part of the Hinduja Group, is an ultra modern tertiary care hospital with a Medical Research Centre. The world class infrastructure of the hospital has been created in association with Massachusetts General Hospital (MGM), Boston, to provide the highest quality of patient care.

name: Even
description:
We pay your hospital bills so you can spend your money on things you love. #FeelFree

Enjoy free OPD and upto ₹1cr. hospital cover with one monthly subscription.

Even is a healthcare provider that offers free primary care (consultations and diagnostics) plus a cashless insurance cover. We believe that no Indian should have to choose between their health and savings.

name: Famwork
description:
Famwork Inc is a subscription-based Cloud-EHR SaaS product were clinics and healthcare providers use to manage their practice. We are focused on network-enabled services for healthcare and point-of-care mobile apps in the United States. AI in healthcare will help in the analysis, presentation, and comprehension of medical data by mimicking human intelligence. Combing AI with machine learning will drastically reduce the workload of healthcare professionals to a great extent by mining health data, automate and predict processes.

Started amidst the pandemic in the month of June 2020. Apparently Covid-19 pandemic has taught us something, it is that the healthcare industry is the backbone of survival and can never sleep. However, it is and it will be always essential. It is by the result of understanding that Famwork came to life. It has now completed almost 10 months and has already set up offices in California, Chennai, and Delhi, and is still on the lookout for expansion with employees from all around the world. If you are interested in working with us, We are Hiring! Famwork was founded in 2020 and has offices in San Francisco, Chennai, and, in addition to remote employees based around the globe

Goal
Establish a Provider Driven Software Suite that is built by the consultation of the provider and for the provider.

Vision
Bringing an innovative Healthcare Solution to the Global Market using Cloud Computing integrated with AI and Machine Learning Technology at affordable prices.

name: Zydus Hospitals
description:
Zydus Hospitals Group is a professionally managed institution rendering quaternary care services to patients from India as well as overseas. Our world class & highly sophisticated medical establishments offer all major medical specialities, sub-specialities, investigation & diagnostics facilities. 
Our hospitals are equipped with the most advanced technology, including the state-of-the-art DaVinci robotics systems and cutting edge radiation oncology and imaging technology to offer healthcare services matching the best in the world. The institution employs full time consultants with overseas exposure & qualifications and possess several years of experience practicing their speciality, thereby offering the highest level of medical care.

name: Centre for Sight
description: Established in 1996, Centre for Sight has been continuously striving to provide specialized eye care for all. The group is a leading provider of specialized eye care with 50+ centres across 25+ cities in 12 states of India. A highly qualified clinical team leads Centre for Sight with modern infrastructure and world-class technology. But above all, the CFS group’s commitment to patient-centric values makes it a trusted name when it comes to quality eye care services.

name: Trufedu
description:
Trufedu is a one-stop solution for all your Health and Wealth needs under one umbrella at an affordable price.

At Trufedu, we are reinventing the entire Health & Wealth stack to make it more personalized, inclusive, and affordable with an integrated Health and Financial Planning approach, backed by technology and data science. Every player in the market is charging on an Ala-Carte basis taking the prices higher. We have bundled the services together to offer a comprehensive package at the most reasonable price

Trufedu, with the above background, offers end to end solutions and has tied up with leading names across the industry for their expertise and product offerings.

name: HealthCare Global
description:
HealthCare Global Enterprises Ltd, headquartered in Bangalore is India's largest Cancer Care Provider. A physician-led initiative that owns and manages a network of 23 cancer centers nationwide. HCG also deals with clinical research and R&D.

For over fifteen years Health Care Global Enterprises has been defining the future of cancer care in India by designing, building and managing cancer centers with a steadfast vision : to transform cancer care environment by bringing core clinical services to one central place. The intent of this single place is to help patients achieve longer, better lives - and to improve cancer care one center at a time.

name: EMPClaims
description:
EMPClaims is a Revenue Cycle Management company. With over 10 years in the industry, EMPClaims specializes in medical billing & coding, telemedicine, workers comp and patient intake solutions. EMP's team of certified coders and billing experts have expertise in niche areas such as cardiology billing, neurology billing, radiology billing, ketamine treatment billing and many more. 

EMP’s processes and workflows ensure highest reimbursements for the services you provide to your patients. The company primarily focuses on Outpatient Practices and Facilities and Patient Experience. 

With EMP as your trusted partner, you have access to process automation that eases compliance and documentation, staff with technical knowledge through a full-fledged KPO that ultimately leads to improving net patient revenue, while you can concentrate on one thing that matters the most, Patient Care!

name: Quintessence Business Solutions & Services
description:
Quintessence is a leading Revenue cycle management services and technology company offering performance-guaranteed and effective solutions to medical billing and medical coding companies and healthcare providers. Our value addition to businesses is by easing the process of end-to-end revenue cycle management by minimizing process errors with automating a wide range of services. 

We have customized tools and BOTS Built using AI, ML and RPA for faster eligibility verification, payment reconciliation, denial capture, also implementing RPA to repetitive data entry activities and improve coding accuracy with our computer assisted coding engine (CAC). We deliver guaranteed Return on Investments throughout your medical billing and coding needs with our customization. As a result, we ensure you achieve financial growth and customer satisfaction from day one of our intervention. 

We are a data-driven company. Our analytic tools help identify new opportunities, build improvement strategies, correct problem areas, and achieve best-in-class performance. Our Contingency-fee model works so beautifully that the savings you make will pay our fees with time, leaving you with a healthy cash flow. Our partner-centric approach, cutting-edge technology, and outcome-driven processes is what makes us create partnerships and not vendor relationships.

Our Mission is to build and deliver services and technologies that our customers will find useful, economical, and powerful. Furthermore, we aim at delighting our current and prospective customers with innovative and ingenious solutions to their everyday business challenges. To make a difference to your business, contact: info@qbsshealth.com or call +1 410 630 4774

Specialties
Computer assisted Coding (CAC) using Machine Learning, BOT's for billing, AR Follow up and Payment Posting, building technologies with AI, ML, RPA for Medical Billing, Medical Coding and Workflow optimization in RCM. HL7 Hospital EDI Interface / EOB to 837,

name: AnnexMed Pvt Ltd
description:
AnnexMed offers best in class revenue cycle management services, powered by a unique combination of people, process and technology. We combine unparalled subject matter expertise and innovative work flows to deliver the highest revenue results possible.

With all our expertise, we enable clients to reduce operating and capital costs, recover revenue, improve patient satisfaction and ultimately the clinical performance of our clients. AnnexMed is your ideal healthcare support partner with the depth of experience in staff, solutions and technology to meet your needs.

We are a team of 1000+ certified Coders & professional Billers with experience in various specialties and industry changes. Our services are tailor-made and catered to over 6000 physicians, helping them to focus on patient care and enhance their revenue.

name: Rainbow Children's Hospitals
description:
We are here because we care for you! Filling your life with the pinkest of health is our dream. At Rainbow Children's Hospitals, we strive to send you home in perfect health as a colorful life welcomes you back.





HEALTHY CHILDREN



Children are such special gifts and bring fulfillment in our lives. And they do deserve the special attention. That is why at Rainbow Hospitals, we have committed ourselves to child health care and always love to see them happy & healthy. Since its inception, Rainbow has been pivotal in saving thousands of children. Our inpatient specialities for child care includes Neonatology, Pediatric Intensive Care, Neurology, Gastro Enterology, Nephrology, Hematology and Oncology, Pediatric Surgery, Cardiology and Nutrition. Equipped with state of the art equipments in medical technology and backed by the expertise of our doctors and consults across a range of clinical specialties, we strive towards making you choose us as the ultimate choice whenever you seek excellence in health care for your children. 



HAPPY MOTHERS & WOMEN



Women, especially mothers-to-be need extra care. After all a child needs a healthy mother just as much as mother wants a healthy child! Our team of dedicated doctors and specialized crew make the gynecology department immaculate and coupled with an excellent obstetric team and fetal medicine team, we render the best service to women as we also prepare expecting mothers for childbearing and make it a pleasurable journey throughout. 



CHEERFUL COUPLES



We welcome couples with the endeavor to fulfill your wish to have a baby of your own. We aim to provide fertility treatment options of international standards with emphasis on personal care, support, transparency and patient privacy. We try our best to ensure your dream of having your child comes alive with our care

name: Dozee
description:
Dozee is India's only contactless health monitor that silently tracks your heart, respiration, sleep patterns, stress levels, cardiac contractions, apnea and more while you sleep. Its AI algorithms enable early detection of any health deterioration, to save lives in time. 


The health information can be accessed remotely by doctors/caretakers on Dozee's patient monitoring system and its app. Dozee’s integration with SpO2 (pulse oximeter) proved instrumental in providing continuous remote monitoring to Covid-19 patients, keeping nurses & doctors safe from exposure to infection. Dozee has been supported by Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Govt. of India, Qualcomm and many esteemed organizations.

name: Morula IVF Indonesia (PT. Morula Indonesia)
description:
Morula IVF Indonesia merupakan bagian dari Bundamedik Healthcare System (BMHS) yang fokus dalam pengembangan klinik fertilitas “Morula IVF” di Indonesia. Dalam pengembangan Bundamedik Healthcare System, pada tahun 1997 mendirikan Klinik Fertilitas Morula (KFM) yang saat ini telah berganti nama menjadi Morula IVF Indonesia, telah menjadi salah satu klinik fertilitas terbesar di Indonesia dengan peningkatan pasien yang mengikut program bayi tabung semakin bertambah setiap tahunnya dengan rata-rata pertumbuhan sebesar 30% pertahun.

Menyadari betapa tingginya kebutuhan akan pelayanan program fertilitas yang terstandar baik dan menghasilkan outcome yang baik, maka Bundamedik Healthcare System (BMHS) berkomitment untuk terus mengembangkan klinik-klinik fertilitas Morula IVF di Indonesia dibawah payung “Morula IVF Indonesia”, yang hingga kini telah ada 9 klinik Morula IVF yaitu:

Klinik Morula IVF Jakarta
Klinik Morula IVF Padang
Klinik Morula IVF Margonda
Klinik Morula IVF Surabaya
Klinik Morula IVF Bandung
Klinik Morula IVF Pontianak
Klinik Morula IVF Makassar
Klinik Morula IVF Tangerang
Klinik Morula IVF Yogyakarta

Klinik Morula IVF fokus dalam membantu pasangan yang mendambakan buah hati. Dengan produk-produk layanan berupa program-program fertilitas yang sesuai dan berdasarkan indikasi yang tepat bagi calon orang tua dengan standarisasi yang ketat dipantau oleh Morula IVF Indonesia

name: Intelehealth
description: Intelehealth is a technology non-profit that's improving access to primary health care in underserved regions of the world through its innovative telemedicine platform. Intelehealth can be used by health organizations to set up high quality telemedicine programs connecting their doctors to patients in remote and rural communities. Our customers are hospitals, NGOs and governments mainly in low and middle income countries where health systems are fractured and there is an acute shortage of health services in rural areas. We provide these public and private sector health organizations with software, devices and implementation support to implement telemedicine programs that cater to the bottom of the economic pyramid.

name: Apollo Spectra Hospitals
description:
Apollo Spectra came into existence to provide world-class facilities to patients for elective surgeries at a reasonable cost, under the parent institution of Apollo Group. We have capabilities to perform procedures across specialties like ENT, General Surgery, Gynaecology, Ophthalmology, Orthopaedics, Paediatrics, Plastic & Cosmetic, Radiology and Urology. Now, you can access Apollo Spectra at a centre near you. Through this endeavour, we intend to reach out to our audience and keep them informed about the ease and convenience of short stay surgeries.
Contact us: Toll Number: 1-860-500-2244 | Email: spectra.callcentre@apollospectra.com

name: Glamyo Health
description:
Glamyo Health (www.glamyohealth.in) is a Series A ($ 6 Mn) funded Health - Tech Platform focussed on Elective Surgeries Market. We are an Asset Light chain of Co Branded Hospitals / Clinics with a focus on segments like general surgeries, cosmetic surgeries, gynaecology, sports injuries, proctology and urology.

Our investors include - Ananta Capital, Agility Ventures, Udtara Ventures, We Founder Circle, Angellist etc.

name: Clove Dental
description:
Clove Dental is India’s largest and fastest-growing dental network, with more than 340+ stand-alone dental clinics pan-India.

A member of the Royal Society of Medicine, Clove stands for delivering the highest quality of dental services following the most stringent sterilization protocols delivered by a team of some of the most renowned and well-known specialists in the country in the most ethical and transparent way.

Clove Dental was established and continues to be guided by some of the world’s leading dental and business professionals. Directors on the board of our parent company Global Dental Services hail from all corners of the globe and bring expertise from their roles with highly respected organizations such as Belron International, General Electric India and D’Ieteren S.A. The company’s board is populated by accomplished dentists from both India and the U.S.

The Clove Dental Team is a dynamic, highly skilled and experienced group of 930+ doctors and includes general dentists, orthodontists, periodontists, pedodontists, endodontists, prosthodontists, implantologists, oral and maxillofacial surgeons and specialists in oral medicine and radiology.
Clove offers a comprehensive set of oral care treatments ranging from treatments for the common cavity to the complete reconstruction of one’s smile. We have conducted 20,000+ ortho treatments, 35,000+ dental implants with the latest state-of-the-art technology.

Specialist treatment for children and complicated maxillofacial surgeries are available in all Clove clinics. With more than 1 Million+ satisfied patients, Clove clinics adhere to the highest standards for hygiene as established by The American Dental Association. All Clove Clinics are open from 10 am - 8pm including weekends.

Blogs on Dental Health can be found here - https://clovedental.in/blog

name: Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital, Navi Mumbai
description: Located strategically in the largest planned city of the country, Navi Mumbai, this patient-centric, affordable, accessible, and one-stop destination enjoys unmatched connectivity to the suburbs of Mumbai and Navi Mumbai.​ ​ With the belief that world-class health care should be the prerogative of all Indians, Kokilaben Hospital, Navi Mumbai offers over 38 speciality departments under one roof, driven by technology, talent, care, and compassion.

name: BeatO
description: Control Diabetes with Experts!

name: BMHS (Bundamedik Healthcare System)
description:
As BMHS is on the verge of entering its fifth decade, BMHS has grown remarkably. Our journey started as a private maternity clinic, now we have more than 9 business units in more 25 locations throughout Indonesia. BMHS is so much more than just a maternity hospital. We are one of the most integrated and comprehensive healthcare services in Indonesia.
Our wide range of services enables us to take care of people from embryo to live. Supported by our team of outstanding individuals, the center of excellence, and cutting edge technologies, BMHS care for your lifetime. We are making a difference with our award-winning care.

name: SightLife
description:
SightLife is the world's leading nonprofit eye bank and global public health organization dedicated to eliminating corneal blindness. Guided by the belief that no one should have to wait for sight-restoring treatment or 
surgery, our programs renew hope, health, and healing to 100,000 people annually in the United States and worldwide.

name: Self
description:
Healthcare communication

Medico Marketing

Clinical Research

Knowledge Process Outsourcing (Healthcare)

Customised Medical Communication

We provide end to end solution in Healthcare communication business and at present operating in India and SE Asia. We also have Business tie up with Canada.

name: Taskar - India's 1st Healthcare Mall
description: We, at “Taskar- India’s 1st healthcare mall” invite you to join us and become a partner of a revolutionary life-changing business. It’s an exciting opportunity to become Taskarpreneur. Taskar healthcare mall is one stop healthcare destination; under one roof company will provide much needed key healthcare services; clinical services (OPD), healthcare at home, diagnostic, telemedicine, quality generic medicines by offering upto 80% lesser prices, Ayurvedic & Branded medicines, and Wide range of surgical devices, Organic food stuff, Gym supplements, health & wellness to cater the needs of children, women, men & senior citizens. It will be backed by at least 1 doctor & a dietician."

name: Mango Sciences
description: Mango Sciences is a leading emerging market data science company connecting millions of underrepresented patients to precision medicine. The company’s Querent™ platform utilizes industry-leading AI analytics to transform deep clinical data into key insights that drive global health improvements. Mango Sciences is currently partnering with hospitals to understand the health data of individuals in India and other emerging markets to drive advancement in patient care and drug discovery for all populations.

name: Aditya Birla Memorial Hospital
description:
ONE MAN’S DREAM,

EVERY MAN’S HOPE

Aditya Birla Memorial Hospital (ABMH) is a multi-speciality medical centre located at Pimpri-Chinchwad in the west Indian state of Maharashtra. The quaternary healthcare centre provides high quality and cost-effective medical services. A tribute to the visionary founder of the Aditya Birla Group, the hospital fulfils the late Mr. Aditya Vikram Birla’s dream of building a world-class healthcare facility in India.

name: Medical Coding Jobs
description:
We are your one-stop resource for medical coding jobs and health care employment. We gather the latest employment openings for medical coding, billing, auditing and practice managers, in one place. Use the fields below to begin your search or visit our Health Job resources page. If you’re a medical employer, post a job below or consider our other resources for hiring a health care professional. See our salary survey results to find out how much medical coders earn.



We offers the most comprehensive resources for you to find a job in medical coding, billing, auditing or practice management and get experience. Job seekers can search through our job database, network with other health care professionals locally or nationwide through our forums, or join Project Xtern to get real-world experience in the medical coding field.

name: GE Healthcare India
description: GE Healthcare is a leading med-tech company that enables precision health in diagnostics, therapeutics and monitoring through intelligent devices, data analytics, applications and services. We started our journey in India with a joint venture with Wipro Limited in 1990. Today, we are one of India’s foremost med-tech solution providers focused on addressing some of the country’s toughest healthcare challenges and improving the lives of over 300 million Indians every year.

name: Wockhardt Hospitals Ltd
description:
Wockhardt Hospital’s existence is the result of a 40-year tradition of caring and innovation nurtured by Wockhardt Ltd, India’s 5th largest Pharmaceutical and Healthcare company with a presence in 20 countries across the globe. By consistently investing in technology and infrastructure which match international benchmarks, Wockhardt Hospitals are today, one amongst the best healthcare institutes in the country. The group has a pan India presence and provides super specialty care in Cardiology/Cardiac Surgery, Orthopedics, Neurology/Neurosurgery, Minimal Access Surgery and Women’s health.



Wockhardt Hospitals currently runs 6 hospitals located at Nagpur (I & II), Nashik, Rajkot, South Mumbai & North Mumbai. 



Wockhardt Hospitals follow process driven quality systems that adhere to international standards of clinical care, safe environment, medication safety, respect for patient rights and privacy and infection control standards. With the latest technology, multi-disciplinary capability, state of the art facilities, world-class infrastructure and excellent patient care ambience and processes, Wockhardt is poised to become the most advanced and progressive healthcare institution in India.

name: Reventics
description:
Reventics is a new-age, physician-focused clinical documentation improvement (CDI) and revenue cycle management (RCM) company. We are changing the way the industry thinks about CDI and RCM by placing the provider at the center of everything we do.

Reventics is focused on Provider performance improvement and its solutions are built on the foundation of its C-A-T model: Clinically focused, Analytics led & Technology driven. The name Reventics itself is derived from the words: “revenue” + “analytics”.

Reventics believes in empowering and partnering with physicians to address the fundamental and longstanding problems of clinical and financial under-performance in a highly complex US healthcare environment. Our approach of a true collaborative partnership model with physicians makes us a unique company in the provider engagement space. Our clients are our partners and through those collaborations, Reventics has developed world class solutions that deliver tangible, measurable results in a short span of time.

Our solutions are client specific and our emphasis is on delivering significant ROI for each client. Our mission is to help our clients focus on patient care while we continue to drive productivity and efficiency increase through analytics-driven, technology-enabled solutions. It means, that by partnering with Reventics, physicians are instantly given the necessary tools to streamline their processes, increase revenue, and enhance their patient experience.

name: KPJ Healthcare Bhd
description:
Since its inception in 1981 as the first private specialist hospital in Johor, KPJ Healthcare has served communities and neighbourhoods nationwide for over 40 years. Our fundamental purpose since day 1 is the delivery of exceptional diagnosis, health treatment and care for all our patients. 

KPJ Healthcare operates 28 hospitals in Malaysia, as well as 2 hospitals in Indonesia, 1 in Bangladesh and 1 in Thailand. KPJ also has 4 Ambulatory Care Centres located in Kuala Lumpur, Pahang, Perak and Selangor. KPJ’s workforce today comprises close to 15,000 employees who support the services provided by more than 1,400 medical consultants specialising in various disciplines who treat more than 2.9 million patients annually. 19 KPJ hospitals are accredited by the Malaysian Society for Quality in Health (MSQH) while 4 are accredited by the Joint Commission International (JCI).

On the education front, the KPJ Healthcare University College (KPJUC) which is located in Negeri Sembilan, offers more than 38 programmes from Foundation to PhD. This has helped KPJ’s hospital network expansion strategies as it ensures KPJ Healthcare has a ready pool of experienced and well-trained talent.

We continue to be dedicated in being the preferred provider of healthcare through the innovative use of technology and by tapping the expertise of experienced consultants as well as qualified medical and non-medical employees who collaborate to offer the best diagnosis and treatment plans wherever we operate.

Today, a reinvigorated KPJ continues to grow from strength to strength and is well positioned to continue creating sustainable value as the biggest private hospital group in Malaysia by bed count capacity and as a regional healthcare player focused on delivering world-class healthcare services, in line with our ‘Care for Life’ tagline.

KPJ Healthcare has been a constituent of the Bursa Malaysia FTSE4Good Index since 2016.

name: Enable Healthcare
description:
Enable Healthcare – Summary of Products and Services 2020 - 2021
EHI delivers HIT Products, & Services to healthcare practices benefiting all stakeholders - Patients, Physicians, and Payers (3Ps). EHI, founded in 2008, operates with Head Quarters in East Hanover, NJ, and offices in Palisades, NY, Cleveland, OH, Mississauga, ON, Canada, and presence in FL, VA, CA, and MI. 
EHI's products, solutions, and services are well received in the Ambulatory Care market across the US for value-based population health management. 
• Chronic Care Management (CCM) platform and patient engagement services by a team of qualified, bi-lingual nurses, enabling patients to become more compliant facilitating value-based care 
• Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM) platform and services by a team of professional nurses, a cornerstone for ‘virtual care’ reducing ER Visits and un-scheduled hospitalization.
• Easy to use and state of art Telehealth platform for Practices
• Tele-Cart Integrated Telehealth platform for SNFs and Assisted Living Organizations to facilitate enhanced virtual care. 
• Virtual Annual Wellness Visit (AWV) utilizing telehealth for patient care to avoid the risk of transmissible COVID 19. 
• State of technology, ONC certified & web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) for Ambulatory Care Practices, is voice-activated, easy to use with EPCS, Direct Messaging, and many enhanced functionalities. 
• Automated and easy to use Practice Management System (PMS) with all enhancements required for the efficient performance of practices, enabling efficient and optimal billing operations 
• Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning integrated billing platform ARIA which can augment technology with 98% payment guaranteed 
• Efficient Revenue Cycle Management Services by EHI’s team of professionals for efficient billing and collection 
• Population Health Management - ACO Advantage Platform for management of ACOs and cost-effective health management of participants.

name: GetixHealth
description:
GetixHealth provides hospitals, clinics, university medical centers, and other healthcare facilities across the United States with comprehensive revenue cycle management (RCM) services. 

Our services are customized to the needs of our client and can either include all facets of the front and back office revenue cycle or a mixture of these services, including but not limited to: medical coding and billing, claims management, insurance eligibility services, medicaid/medicare specialized services, and self pay and bad debt collections.

name: Unify Healthcare Services
description:
Unify healthcare is a one stop solution to all the billing intricacies. We offer customised solutions ranging from Staff augmentation, operations consulting to full service billing etc.. based on client’s requirements. In fact our solutions have already helped our clients (Medical billing Companies and Healthcare providers) to excel in providing healthcare services along with reduced operational cost, boost revenue, increase cash flow, maximize efficiency all with automated workflow and enhanced technological experience.
**We comply and always keep up with the ever changing federal and Insurance regulations.

name: QWay Healthcare
description:
QWay Healthcare- A global Hospital/Institutional billing, Revenue Cycle Management (RCM), and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) Company that has been a trusted partner in delivering optimized solutions to healthcare institutions helping them with improved financial performance and quick turnaround time of the ARs. QWay Healthcare has an exceptional understanding of the healthcare servicing market and aims to build a strong web of delivering revenue management solutions to clients specializing in the healthcare domain. Based in New Jersey with over 1000+ staff, having a solid grip in domain knowledge, operational excellence, innovative and cost-effective approach with result-driven processes, we hold expertise in providing better medical billing experience, equipped with the latest technology to implement the best. We are a multispeciality and support over 3500+ providers, with 40+ billing systems, process over $500 million of A/R annually, and ascribe medical codes to over 4 lakh charts annually.
We are members with HBMA & RBMA, along with HIPAA & ISO 9001:2105 & ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certifications.
For more information, visit us at www.qwayhealthcare.com 
Call us at: +1-844-640-1488

name: Thumbay Hospital
description: At Thumbay Hospitals we aim to provide exceptional quality of care with latest technology, highly skilled medical work force from 20 nationalities, speaking more than 50 languages, treating our guests from more than 175 nationalities worldwide with warm Arabian Hospitality.The hospital is managed by qualified professionals with wide range of experience in hospital management.

name: MGM Healthcare
description: At MGM Healthcare, we are committed to improving life through outstanding healthcare. We are a state-of-the-art, JCI, NABH and LEED Platinum Certified, 400 bed Quaternary care multi-speciality Hospital in Chennai,India. MGM Healthcare aspires to deliver outstanding clinical outcomes and patient experiences with world class expertise backed by next generation medical and digital technologies. Our vision is to create a complete healthcare ecosystem for personalized medical care.

name: MedPiper Technologies, Inc
description:
MedPiper is building the global knowledge graph of medical professionals; connecting people, data, governments and organisations to enable better and faster healthcare outcomes.

Jobs at: https://medpiper.freshteam.com/jobs

name: Shalby Limited
description:
