Our expertise cover industries as food and beverage, chemical and pharmaceuticals, wood and paper, minerals and mining, vehicles and machines, textiles and apparel, devices and technology. 


We work with clients in 5 continents providing services as Trading, Analytics and Representations.

name: DTRIC Insurance Company, Limited
description: DTRIC Insurance Company, Limited is a member of MS&AD Insurance Group, Japans largest insurance holding company and the fifth largest property and casualty insurance group in the world. As DTRIC Insurance only serves Hawaii, weve developed a deep understanding of our customers needs and lifestyles, enabling us to create and offer customized products and services. All of our customers receive personalized, one-to-one attention from experienced insurance agents who carefully review customers unique needs. Thanks to responsible underwriting rules and a growing number of innovative insurance products, we offer valuable protection, benefits, and services at competitive prices. This customer-first business philosophy has resulted in thousands of satisfied customers throughout the State of Hawaii. In fact, nine out of 10 DTRIC customers would recommend us to their friends and family. Learn more at www.dtric.com.

name: Commonwealth Land Title Insurance Company
description:
Commonwealth is the very first Incorporated Title Insurance Company providing Title Insurance, Escrow Services, and National Commercial Services since 1876.


In 1876, a group of conveyancers met in a small office in Pennsylvania to incorporate one of the worlds first title insurance companies, The Real Estate Title Insurance Company of Philadelphia. Later that same year, they issued the first modern title insurance policy and with it an industry was born. We know the company today as Commonwealth Land Title Insurance Company.


In 1998 Commonwealth Land Title Insurance Company joined with Lawyers Title Insurance Company and Transnation Title Insurance Company to become LandAmerica Financial Group, Inc. 


Since 2008 Commonwealth is a member of the Fidelity National Financial, Inc. (NYSE: FNF, www.fnf.com) family of title companies comprising Alamo Title Company (www.alamotitle.com) , Chicago Title Insurance Company (www.ctic.com), Commonwealth Land Title Company (www.cltic.com), Fidelity National Title Insurance Company (www.fntic.com), Heritage Title Company (www.heritagetco.com), Lawyers Title Insurance Company (www.ltic.com), Security Title Agency (www.securitytitle.com), and Ticor Title (www.ticortitle.com) which collectively represent the largest title insurance and escrow services company in the world.

name: Berkley Financial Specialists (a Berkley Company)
description:
Berkley Financial Specialists is dedicated to providing customized, comprehensive insurance solutions and outstanding personalized service to financial institutions and insurance companies. 


Our Berkley Crime division provides crime related insurance products to commercial organizations, financial institutions and governmental entities.


We know you need a business partner that has a strong financial foundation. 


We are a member company of W. R. Berkley Corporation and underwrite on behalf of several W. R. Berkley Corporation member companies each of which carry A+ (Superior) A.M. Best ratings, Financial Size Category XV, and A+ (Strong) S&P ratings.

name: APS Payments, a REPAY Company
description:
APS Payments was acquired by REPAY, a leading provider of vertically-integrated payment solutions, in October 2019. 


REPAY's payment technology helps companies serve customers better and be more profitable through the integrated, intelligent management of inbound payments, outbound payments, and consumer messaging.


Our proprietary, cloud-based transaction management platform is powerful, flexible, and customizable. Through a single convenient portal, clients have real-time visibility into the entire lifecycle of a payment or messagewith ironclad data security, built-in regulatory compliance, and comprehensive tracking and analytics.


REPAY is a public company listed on the Nasdaq Stock Market under the ticker symbol RPAY and has been a certified Great Place to Work since 2017. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, GA, and has offices in Bettendorf, IA; Chattanooga, TN; Chicago, IL; Dallas, TX; East Moline, IL; Fort Worth, TX; Mesa, AZ; Phoenix, AZ; Salt Lake City, UT; and Sarasota, FL. For more information, visit www.repay.com. 


Visit www.repay.com to learn more.

name: Selden Beattie, Inc., Now A OneDigital Company
description:
Selden Beattie, Inc., a OneDigital Company, was established by Beverly Beattie in 1997 with a vision to Change the Conversation around employee benefits and people, transforming the Client/Broker relationship to that of Client and Trusted Advisor. Selden Beattie has more than 25 years of experience providing group health and benefit plan consulting along with workforce strategy and HR advisory services specified in your RFP. 


Nationally, OneDigital is the largest company focused exclusively on employee benefits, combining people and technology to deliver the new generation of health benefits. Servicing companies of all sizes, OneDigital offers employers a sophisticated combination of strategic advisory services, analytics, compliance support, human resources capital management tools and comprehensive insurance offerings.

name: Sales Navigator Test Company
description: Sales Navigator Test

name: Decorah and Cresco Bank & Trust Company
description:
Decorah Bank & Trust Co. was established in 1935 during the depression by a small group of concerned citizens. Today, we are a 2nd and 3rd generation family-owned bank that is able to provide quality banking services with personalized small-town service because we're not owned by outside investors at a far-away headquarters. By being family and employee-owned, we're able to uniquely respond to customer and community needs and make every effort to do our part to help our communities remain healthy and happy.


We believe in being a good steward of the environment. From our energy conservation and eco-friendly efforts, we are taking steps to be treat Mother Earth. This also benefits our customers and employees with cleaner air to breathe and more eco-friendly services to enjoy. 


Decorah Bank & Trust Co. is an FDIC Member and an Equal Housing Lender. We are here to provide quality banking services including Personal Banking, Ag Banking, Business Banking, Wealth Management, and much more. If you have specific questions about your bank account or opening one, please call us at 563-382-9661 (Decorah) or 563-547-2244 (Cresco).

name: The 1911 Trust Company, LLC
description: The 1911 Trust Company works to ensure that family legacies are managed prudently for future generations by providing personalized trust, wealth management and multi-generational family office services.

name: HMK Insurance, An Alera Group Company
description: We are a full-service insurance agency providing business, employee benefits and personal insurances for individuals, families and companies. Founded in 1914, we have grown with the Lehigh Valley area to now insure thousands of businesses and individuals. We are a founding member of The Alera Group and pride ourselves in our industry knowledge and exceptional customer service. We provide the best of both worlds  national scope combined with local service. Our mission is to transform the client experience by providing a greater depth and breadth of resources, innovative thinking and constant collaboration, while maintaining strong local relationships.

name: Five States Energy Company, LLC
description: Here at Five States, we cherish the connections we build with our investors and believe in being prudent guardians of the assets our investors place with us. Founded in 1985, Five States is a private equity investment firm focused on cash flow-generating opportunities in energy. We aim to build portfolios of high-quality assets that will produce long-term income for our investors. For more about Five States, visit fivestates.com

name: Hospitals Insurance Company
description:
Hospitals Insurance Company (HIC), a New York State licensed insurance company, with its office in NYC, NY, provides professional liability, general liability and other insurance coverage for hospitals, long-term care facilities, physicians, and health care professionals throughout New York State. Since 1987, HIC has served the insurance needs of the medical community with a strong commitment to personal service, competitive rates and security for its policyholders.


With over twenty-five years of experience in the business, HIC is one of the oldest healthcare professional liability insurers in the country. The HIC program includes:


- primary and excess professional liability, general liability, and other lines of insurance 
- claims administration and litigation management, and 
- clinical risk prevention and patient safety initiatives.


As risk management advisor to its clients, HIC has a deep interest in initiatives to reduce patient injury and improve clinical outcomes. HIC systematically collects and analyzes data on incidents, losses and claims; helps identify potential hazards; investigates adverse patient incidents; and provides claims administration and litigation management services.

name: The Gray Insurance Company
description:
Founded in 1953, The Gray Insurance Company is family-owned, relationship-based and service-focused. Gray provides Workers'_ Compensation, Automobile, and General Liability coverage on a specific and aggregate basis. Services also include Claims Management and Loss Prevention services. The Gray program was designed to respond to overlapping state and federal jurisdictions and their complex contractual arrangements. Coverage is offered through appointed agents and we are headquartered in southeast Louisiana, focusing primarily on the Gulf Coast and the southeastern United States.


As part of our loss-sensitive program, the Gray plan includes pre-funded SIRs/Deductibles, in amounts determined by monthly payroll reporting, providing stable cash flow to the insureds throughout their policy periods. This also allows our insureds to save these funds if losses are controlled. In most states, Gray provides stop-loss protection, protecting the insured should they experience increased claims frequency.


Our relationship-based approach allows us to form and maintain close relationships with each of our clients. These relationships allow us to take a long-term view and allow us to follow through on our commitment to providing exceptional service.


Preferred Industries: Oilfield Service Contractors, Maritime Operations, Industrial Plant Contractors, Specialty Trade Contractors, and Heavy Construction.

name: Provident Trust Group, an Ascensus company
description: Start here. Go anywhere. Provident Trust Group, an Ascensus company, is an IRA custodian, specializing in alternative asset investments and self-directed retirement options. Provident Trust Group can help you set up a self-directed Individual Retirement Account that will give you access to non-traditional assets such as real estate, notes, precious metals and other alternative assets. Owned and operated by a team of tax attorneys since 2008, contact us today and we can provide you with the support to self-direct.

name: Union Bank and Trust Company
description:
At Union Bank & Trust, we know you want to feel secure and confident in your pursuit of a financial services partner, one thats committed to providing you with services and solutions that meet and exceed your expectations. We believe you deserve a best-in-class team that is focused squarely on the personal and professional demands of you and your organizations financial life. This is how weve been building relationships for over 40 years. 


Whether you are looking for Commercial Banking Services, an Institutional Trust Services or Personal Trust Services, our dedicated group of specialists work tirelessly to create solutions customized for your financial needs. We are owned in perpetuity with a stable ownership model so were with you for the long haul. Were here to serve you, your business and your clientsnow, and 40 years from nowwhile honoring a tradition that upholds our founding values.

name: WSC & Company
description: WSC & Company is a private investment firm focused on acquiring businesses through the traditional search fund model.

name: Lawyers Mutual Liability Insurance Company of N.C.
description:
Lawyers Mutual, founded in 1977, is the first mutually owned insurance company for lawyers in the country. Lawyers Mutual is the only company that has provided continuous coverage to North Carolina lawyers during that time. Its reputation for leadership, professionalism and commitment to its attorneys has become a standard for other malpractice insurance providers. The mission at Lawyers Mutual is not only to protect North Carolina lawyers with the best possible financial coverage against professional liability, but also to provide education and risk management resources to help them better serve their clients and the public. 


What began as a vision has now endured for nearly five decades - a professional liability insurance company owned and controlled by the lawyers of North Carolina. Lawyers Mutual was founded with a simple mission: Lawyers Helping Lawyers. For over 45 years, we have done just that for our loyal policyholders while building for a better tomorrow.


Visit www.lawyersmutualnc.com


Legal Insurance | Legal Education | Attorney | Appellate Court | Litigation expert | Criminal Law | Counselor Liability | North Carolina Legal Claims | CLE

name: TIP Capital, a Crestmark Bank Company
description:
TIP Capital was created in January 1999 by former senior executives of AT&T Capital Corporation to engage in the sale, lease financing and remarketing of technology, telecommunications and medical technology equipment, and to provide business finance solutions to its end-user customers and business partners.


During the last 20 years the management team has been directly responsible for the origination of over $2B of creative lease financing solutions for their customers. In September 2014, Crestmark acquired TIP Capitals equipment leasing and asset management business. As the wholly owned subsidiary of Crestmark Bank, this new division is named Crestmark Equipment Finance, Inc., a Crestmark Bank Company; however during a transition period, the division will continue to operate under the TIP Capital name and out of its current locations at this time to ensure continued strong service quality.


TIP Capital originates new lease transactions with end-user customers, either directly or indirectly, through strategic vendor finance programs, performs remarketing services, buys and sells equipment in both the retail and wholesale markets, and acquires portfolios of existing equipment lease transactions for investment.


To support these dedicated businesses, and maintain its leadership role in each market, TIP Capital has made significant investments in the latest technology platforms and software systems to provide its customers and business partners with state-of-the-art products and services delivered over the Internet.


In 2012, TIP Capital upgraded its IT platform by deploying a private cloud hosted at The Markley Groups flagship datacenter located in Boston, Massachusetts to provide our customers and partners with a flexible, scalable and highly available platform that significantly increases performance and availability while reducing our power consumption.


For more information on our company, please visit www.tipcapital.com or www.crestmark.com.

name: Cochrane & Company
description:
Cochrane & Company was established in 1960 in Spokane, Washington. Over the years, it has been our commitment to provide our agents with professional and timely underwriting service. Combined with our satellite offices strategically located in Roseville, Albuquerque, Denver and Kalispell, we are prepared to respond to any service you may need.


We pride ourselves in service, people and technology. We have a professional staff with years of experience to help place and service your business. Our paperless system allows us to access files at the touch of a button, enabling us to answer your questions immediately. You will find that you'll get the undivided attention of each employee you work with and will leave each conversation with the peace of mind that we are working with you and for you. 


Our company has a number of markets that work in conjunction with our 6 underwriting centers: 


Commercial Property & Casualty 
Commercial Transportation and Garage 
Commercial Brokerage 
Professional Liability
Personal Lines 
Bonds/Surety
Programs
Garage 




We are appointed with many different markets, both admitted and non-admitted and can place risks from a small beauty shop business owner's policy to a large commercial fleet. We have staff dedicated to each department, allowing specialized underwriting for those hard to place risks.


We welcome any opportunity to be of service to your agency.

name: Stump & Company
description: Looking to sell your furniture business? With 50+ years of intimate industry experience, Stump & Company helps business owners explore their options to pursue strategic M&A transactions in the furniture and furnishings industries, both in domestic and global markets. We use our significant furniture and industry experience to provide investment banking services across all verticals of the industry, including residential, office/contract, hospitality, e-commerce, and retail, as well as to suppliers to the manufacturing trade.

name: HDI Global SE
description:
Companies from the trading, manufacturing and service industries need an insurance partner they can rely on. HDI has been one of the leading insurers, offering a broad and needs-based range of insurance solutions and accompanying services for more than ten decades. 


HDI Global SE is the flagship company of the Industrial Clients Division of Talanx Group. Along with other affiliated "HDI"_ entities, the company is part of TALANX Group which works successfully as a multi-brand provider in the segments of Property/Casualty and Life Primary Insurance, Non-Life & Life/Health Reinsurance (Hannover Re) and Financial Services.


HDI Global SE is the strong partner for B2B services in the Insurance and Risk Management sectors. We are a one-stop shop for innovative solutions geared to a client's specific needs. HDI develops bespoke insurance concepts precisely tailored to the operating risks facing every size and type of company. Comprehensive risk management designed to prevent losses and damage occurring, just as much from part of the company's reliable service, as professional and prompt claims management.


The company, with its headquarters in Germany, generates more than half of its premium volume internationally. Europe is its core market and here HDI is represented in 17 countries, employing around 2,700 people. In line with this international focus, the former HDI-Gerling Industrie Versicherung AG changed its name to HDI Global SE in 2016. Branches, subsidiaries and affiliates the world over have also been renamed to ensure a uniform corporate image. The company now operates worldwide under the HDI brand.

name: MUSIC - Mesa Underwriters Specialty Insurance Company
description: MUSIC, Mesa Underwriters Specialty Insurance Company, is more than an excess and surplus insurance carrier. MUSIC customers know that our stellar service, underwriting talent, and advanced technology set us apart. Our reputation has also been earned through valued relationships weve developed with our agency partners, who trust that MUSIC fills a need they have for unique markets. Our team of insurance specialists, located in Arizona and Pennsylvania has extensive knowledge writing small and medium-sized commercial businesses, along with brokerage and program accounts.

name: Midland Trust Company
description:
Who is Midland?


The Midland umbrella of companies is a leading custodial services provider focused on self-directed IRA accounts, 1031 exchanges and private fund custody services. In business since 1994, Midland is focused on providing clients with as many opportunities as possible to defer or eliminate taxes. With thousands of satised clients and Billions of dollars in assets under administration, Midland possesses the experience and knowledge to assist clients with their nancial goals.


Midland is an ESOP Company


Employee Ownership empowers its staff to pave the way for the future. In December 2019, Midland and its affiliates became employee-owned via the Midland ESOP Trust. Our employees have an entrepreneurial spirit which sets the company apart. The ESOP allows them to have a say in their company and share in the profit. As a result, employee-owners are adding to their retirement and building and diversifying their financial portfolios.


What is self-direction?


A self-directed IRA is not a type of IRA, but a little-known way to invest through your IRA. Self-direction allows the investor to expand their portfolio from the typical stocks and bonds available with most IRA companies. The IRS allows you to choose your own investments, such as real estate, futures, foreign currency (forex), notes (loans/mortgages), LLCs, precious metals, energy, or even movie deals! The possibilities of self-direction are endless.

name: TIM, An Acuris Company
description:
TIM provides the worlds largest independent trade ideas network, linking 3,000 individual contributors at 250 sell-side firms with buy-side hedge funds and asset managers.


Our mission is to help contributors and recipients gain maximum value from trade ideas. Helping investment managers earn market-beating returns by providing market insights such as electronic advice and trading signals, and facilitating market insight providers gaining revenue for their IP.


The TIM platform:
 captures trade ideas for distribution via data feeds and screen-based platforms
 adds analytical value via performance reporting and idea aggregation
 distributes complementary content via the screen-based platform
 provides services such as broker and client introductions.


Headquartered in London, TIM has offices in New York, Boston and Hong Kong, enabling our global team to support and respond to our clients needs wherever they are.

name: Federal Title & Escrow Company
description:
Federal Titles humble beginnings trace back to a single, closet-sized sublet office, with a makeshift desk fashioned from a piece of plywood strewn across a couple sawhorses by founder Todd Ewing.


That was back in the fledgling days of the Internet when paper closings and manual rate calculations were considered high technology. Ewing digitized all of it, and Federal Title became the nations first title company to offer online ordering and transparent, instant online quotes. Next came innovations such as REAL Credit, paperless closings and the popular cash-to-close app Close It!


Over the years, Ewings outfit has grown in size to more than 20 employees and now offers five convenient closing locations across DC, MD + VA  plus remote online closings. To this day, Federal Title continues to pioneer new ways to harness technology to anticipate the needs of clients, and their clients, and deliver a pleasant and painless closing experience for all.


Federal Title remains independent and 100-percent in the corner of every buyer and seller we serve, dedicated to building successful partnerships with every real estate professional we encounter.


Giving Initiatives -


We believe were here to help each other, to take care of each other. Thats at the heart of everything we do; its baked into our culture.


We proudly support several local non-profits and charities that are taking care of our friends and neighbors in the Greater Capital Region, through giving initiatives such as our holiday giving campaign and by sharing their stories on our blog and social media pages. Causes include childrens education, health care, social justice, animal welfare and more.

name: Swerdlin & Company (now FuturePlan by Ascensus)

Supporting more than 1000 clients in 50 states, Swerdlin & Company provides actuarial, consulting, administrative, and recordkeeping services for all types of retirement, health, and cafeteria plans.


Founded in 1980 by Dorn and Joanne Swerdlin, Swerdlin & Company specializes in finding the best benefits solutions to meet your organizations needs. Our team is made up of more than 80 experts including credentialed actuaries, attorneys, and client relationship managers, ensuring you have access to the right people when you need them most.


Connect with us today to learn how Swerdlin & Company can find the right benefits administration solution for your organization.

description: Whitney & Company is a Rochester based Independent Registered Investment Advisor (RIA) built on long-term relationships. Everything we do springs from a genuine caring for our clients.

name: Monex Deposit Company
description:
For 50 years, Monex has been America's trusted name in gold and other precious metals. With client transactions now totaling over $60 billion. Today, Monex is America's premier precious metals dealer because of our dedication to customer service and satisfaction. Located in Newport Beach, California, Monex is home to a staff of hard asset professionals committed to serving our clients'_ investment needs with a convenient two-way market and competitive pricing. As a result of our clients'_ trust in Monex, 80% of our business is from repeat precious metals business, and about one-quarter of our new clientele are referred to us by existing customers. 


Today, three generations of the Carabini family are now working at Monex, including founder Louis Carabini, his son and president Michael, and Michael's daughters Christina and Anna Maria. In addition, more than 43% of Monex employees have been with the company for a decade or more.

Because we are independently owned, our focus is on our customers rather than on a stock price or shareholder value. Our value is determined by the satisfaction of our customers.

name: Bridgeford Trust Company
description:

Routinely ranked as one of the nations best and most progressive trust jurisdictions, South Dakota fiduciary law gives our clients access to some of the most advanced asset protection and dynasty trust capabilities in the United States as well as the ability to hold non-traditional assets in trusts. In addition, South Dakotas confidentiality provisions and directed trust statutes are among the best in the country, allowing a client to confidentially work with financial advisors or investment managers of their choosing in the administration of trust assets. 


Bridgeford Trust Company delivers far more direction and control to clients and their advisors than ever before because of South Dakotas modern trust laws. Learn more at: www.bridgefordtrust.com/southdakotaadvantage.

Houston Trust Company was founded in 1994 and is owned by eight families who shared the Company's vision. All Houston Trust Company employees own stock in the company in addition to these eight families.

Lohr & Company is a multi-generational financial advisory firm that deeply understands the importance of listening to you. Since 1993, our mission has been to provide our clients with the guidance they need to reach their dreams.

name: Advicare, an Aspirion Company
description:
Advicare is now Aspirion. Please visit the Aspirion company page at https://www.linkedin.com/company/aspirion-health-resources-llc.


Aspirions mission is to be providers trusted partner to optimize otherwise challenging reimbursements


Aspirion is a full-service revenue cycle management (RCM) company founded in 2006 that specializes exclusively in complex claims and denials. Our complex claims consist of Motor Vehicle Accident (MVA), third-party liability (TPL), Workers Compensation, Veterans Administration, Out-of-State Medicaid, and Medicaid Eligibility & Enrollment claims. Our denials service lines include premium denials and lower-value denials. While our clients traditionally categorize all of these claims as complex, to us they are simply claimsand they are all we do. Aspirion has one of the largest and most highly trained teams of investigators, specialists, clinicians, coders and attorneys. We work together to make our clients better.

name: Trade It, Inc., a TradingView company
description:
TradeIt powers online investing. TradeIt has developed a patent pending technology bringing the top retail brokers and wealth management companies to the apps and social networks where customers engage. TradeIt understands that consumers are increasingly engaged on mobile apps for the business of their lives. TradeIt is bringing the top Financial Institutions customer journey - account opening, account management and trading - to the apps where the action happens.


With apps like WeChat serving as operating systems and PSD2 in Europe, APIs are the future of innovation and the means for reaching customers securely. Financial Institutions have come to rely on TradeIt to spec, build and deploy secure and compliant APIs into TradeIts ecosystem.


TradeIts signature products, TradingTicket and PortfolioView, bring the top retail online brokers closer to their customers mobile journeys by putting the retail brokers products onto 100+ of the top investing apps. By adding the capabilities to link your brokerage account securely and compliantly to a mobile app and then being about to place orders to your broker, provides investors the ability to act where they are inspired. 


Trade It is a NYC based FinTech, backed by Valar Ventures, Point72, Citi Ventures and Gaingels. TradeIt won the Global Citi Mobile Challenge for the Most Innovative Trading Solution in 2015.

name: The Everest Equity Company, Inc.
description:
In all honesty, people borrow from people.

Founded in 2004 by Brooke Jacob, Everest Equity lives by a unique philosophy: Every mortgage, however large or small, regardless of what it is used for, is a relationship between the people who borrow and the people who lend.

Sure, a loan is inherently transactional, burdened by compliance, and laden with paperwork. But behind each mortgage is a beating human heart and feverish human mind:


The hopeful borrower pining to own their own home for the first time
The growing family yearning to upsize to adequate breathing space
The individual investor trying to carefully grow their fledgling portfolio
The CRE syndicator working overtime to deliver to their shareholders
The commercial developer striving to launch a community project
The investment fund manager stewarding every dollar with honesty

Beyond our formidable team of 40+ experts, powerful internal processes, and unparalleled national network, is it this humanistic perspective that sets our company apart from every other brokerage.

When we promise A Heightened Level of Commitment, we are positioning our skills, experience, relationships, negotiation know-how, and industry trust in support of your dream. Plus, of course, our own beating heart and fervent care. For all the same reasons, the nations leading lending institutions know usand prefer us.

On both ends of the mortgage aisle, everyone who deals with Everest comes to us for our closing reputation, and stays with us for our open humanity.

We look forward to helping you discover, pursue, and achieve #YourEverest soon.

The Passionate People at Everest Equity


The Everest Equity Company, Inc. Registered Mortgage Broker, New York State Department of Financial Services. Mortgage Broker Licensed by the New Jersey Department of Banking and Insurance. Licensed Mortgage Broker CT, PA, FL and NC Banking Departments. Loans arranged through third party providers. Equal Housing Opportunity. Company NMLS ID# 1248

name: Merrimak Capital Company
description: Merrimak Capital is the industrys largest full-service independent diverse lessor delivering outstanding customer service, innovative ideas, and diversity spend credit. Merrimak provides leasing services for an array of assets in direct response to customers needs. As a general lessor, Merrimak understands the secondary market for all types of capital assets. Our primary focus remains in leasing technology, fleet, material handling and machine tools, but the company actively leases assets in many markets. With 30 years of experience and over $5Billion in remarketed and repurposed equipment (based on original equipment cost), we understand asset resale and how the circular economy works. CUAC is owned by 15 Credit Unions and provides lending services for hundreds of Credit Unions across the United States. CUAC is a member of the CU Alliance, LLC family of Credit Union Services. 


CUACs indirect lending solutions were formed to help Credit Unions retain current member loans, grow auto loan portfolios and increase membership by enabling them provide point of sale finance opportunities at participating auto dealerships. Simply put, the auto dealership's hours of operation become the Credit Union's extended hours. 


Credit Unions enjoy responsible auto loan growth and one stop car shopping for their members. CUAC provides rapid program implementation, automated loan decisions, a national state of the art funding center and a complete marketing platform to participating auto dealerships.

name: IRAR Trust Company
description:
Established in 1996, we're an administrator and custodian to self-directed IRAs, specializing in private placements, real estate, LLCs, notes, and other non-traditional investments. 


We work with financial and real estate professionals who incorporate self-directed IRAs into their strategy to grow their business. We pride ourselves on being experienced, knowledgeable, and affordable.

name: EDWARD D JONES & COMPANY
description: EDWARD D JONES & COMPANY is an investment management company based out of 12555 Manchester Rd, St Louis, MO, United States.

name: Company Launch Partners
description:
Company Launch Partners was birthed out of a desire to provide strong, hands-on financial management to startups and emerging growth companies. Born out of the conviction that an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure, what we offer is a response to the common perception among entrepreneurs that they cannot afford to hire a CFO, yet cannot afford to be without one. The formation of this company is the result of a love affair with the startup community and small to mid size businesses. It is the result of customer feedback, competitive research, reading, long silent walks and sleepless nights.

Our company values serve as real measurements for our company. It is our desire that all company operations point back to our values and team members challenge each other against such statements. They are the backbone of the company and are much more than mere words included in a presentation, or listed on our website. They are to be fundamental to all we do.

We value:
-Partnerships
-Being proactive with strong follow up
-Addressing issues before they become problems
-Excellence in our work and presentation
-Continued learning
-Having a positive impact on people's lives.

name: Cornerstone Private Asset Trust Company
description:
Cornerstone Private Asset Trust Company is an independent boutique trust and retirement services firm based in South Dakota. We provide a superior level of customized, wealth-management services to high-net-worth individuals, business owners and corporations throughout the United States. Our team of highly skilled and dedicated professionals offer:


TRUST SERVICES
We work with clients to ensure the wealth they worked so hard to build is transferred seamlessly to the next generation. Because we are an independent trust company, we can provide many services other trust firms cannot. Cornerstone can serve as a trustee for any type of trust, personal or corporate. In addition, we serve as agents for individual trustees or other corporate trusts; conservators for those unable to manage their own affairs; personal representatives; and, executors of estates. We walk alongside beneficiaries, providing comprehensive education on the financial resources set aside for their benefit, and assist them as the grantors dreams for their family are realized years later.


RETIREMENT PLANNING SERVICES
We know the primary goal of a business owner is to successfully operate and grow the business. Cornerstone provides a personal approach to learn about the company, research high-quality investment options, and develop creative and tailored retirement plans designed to best meet the needs of the business and its employees. We routinely develop customized 401(k) plans, Simple IRA plans, and Individual Solo (k) plans for companies. Cornerstone helps business owners by serving as directed trustees on retirement plans, and significantly reducing the owners fiduciary risk.


PUT YOUR TRUST IN SOUTH DAKOTA
South Dakota is considered one of the top states to set up a trust because of the favorable trust laws. No matter where you live, you can take advantage of the benefits and flexibility afforded with a South Dakota trust. For more information, visit: www.cornerstone.net.

name: Cannon Trading Company, Inc.
description:
Whether you are a newcomer to the futures market, an experienced trader, a hedger, or an Institution in the United States of America or overseas, we can provide you with valuable assistance in your futures trading.
We have the ability to service International clients who wish to excel in trading futures and futures options.


Online trading is becoming a popular way to trade, not only for stocks, but also for futures. You will communicate online, instantaneously and free of charge with an experienced, registered professional.


Of the many systems available, we have researched and chosen to be affiliated with Man Financial for pit-traded commodities and Transact Futures for E-mini trading. There are many advantages to trading online with E-Futures: its user-friendly software transmits orders quickly and allows you to prepare and send them when you are ready. You will receive order fills back on your computer.

name: ICMG - Inter-Company Marketing Group
description:
ICMG's greatest strength is bringing decision makers together, creating unique opportunities to make innovative deals that grow the respective businesses of our nearly 500 members.


Known as the place where deals get done, the ICMG Annual Conference is an event where attendees deliver personal opening introductions, schedule one-on-one meetings, network in the exhibit hall, learn from session speakers, and make connections.

name: VCU Investment Management Company
description: VCU Investment Management Company or VCIMCO is a non-profit organization incorporated under Virginia law within the meaning of Section 501(c)(3) of the IRS Code of 1986. VCIMCO provides investment management and related services to the Rector and the Board of Visitors of Virginia Commonwealth University, and/or to other affiliated entities operating in support of its mission.

name: Sawgrass Mutual Insurance Company
description:
Sawgrass Mutual Insurance Company is a mutual property and casualty insurance company headquartered in Sunrise, Florida.


As a mutual insurer, we are owned and governed by our policyholders. Also unique to a mutual insurer, all profits earned by the company, and the growth of its financial resources, remain in the company for the benefit of our policyholders (owners).


Sawgrass Mutual specializes in writing voluntary homeowners policies through a select network of professional independent agent partners located throughout Florida. As partners, Sawgrass Mutual and our selected agents are focused on the wellbeing of our policyholders and the communities in which they reside.

name: Community Trust and Investment Company
description:
Community Trust and Investment Company is a subsidiary of Community Trust Bancorp, Inc. We are headquartered in Lexington, Kentucky and have locations in Ashland, Pikeville, and La Follette, Tennessee. 


Community Trust and Investment Company is one of the most reputable trust companies in Kentucky with assets under management of over $2.8 billion and total assets of $3 billion. In addition, we are a publicly traded company listed on the NASDAQ (CTBI).


Community Trust and Investment Company offers a variety of investment services including investment management, retirement services, trust and estate services, life insurance, college planning, and everything in between. Our services are provided for individuals, families, and businesses alike.

name: Commonwealth Annuity and Life Insurance Company
description: Commonwealth Annuity and Life Insurance Company is a leading provider of products that offer capital, risk and business solutions for insurance companies throughout the United States. The company specializes in reinsurance, restructurings and acquisitions to help carriers achieve business objectives and growth. A focus on investment and risk management, along with commitment to service, underlie Commonwealths track record and reputation throughout the industry. The company is a subsidiary of Global Atlantic Financial Group, a multiline insurance and reinsurance company that was founded at Goldman Sachs in 2004 and separated as independent company in April of 2013.

name: UNC Management Company
description: The UNC Management Company (UNCMC), formed as a nonprofit organization, provides investment management and administrative services to the $5bn+ UNC Investment Fund. The UNC Investment Fund was established as an investment vehicle for the long-term assets of the 17 institutions (and their affiliates) that comprise the University of North Carolina system.

name: Berkeley Endowment Management Company
description: Established in 2009, the Berkeley Endowment Management Company provides professional stewardship of endowment gifts given to the University of California, Berkeley Foundation in support of UC Berkeleys mission of teaching, research, and public service.

name: C. T. Lowndes & Company Insurance Agency
description:
C. T. Lowndes & Company is South Carolina's oldest insurance agency, serving the Lowcountry of S.C. since 1850. At C. T. Lowndes & Company, you can purchase insurance policies from one of the many fine insurance companies the agency represents. C. T. Lowndes & Company is an independent insurance agency, a Trusted Choice insurance agency, a family owned business with a wonderful reputation in the Greater Charleston, South Carolina region, to include Charleston, Colleton, Berkeley, and Dorchester counties.


Our agents provide free quotes at affordable prices for automobile, truck, and motorcycle; home, dwelling, condo, mobile home, and renters; boat, jet ski, ATV, golf cart, RV, and other power sports and recreational vehicle insurance; wedding insurance, business, general liability, package policies, workers compensation insurance for small and large businesses; individual and group health; long term care, dental, and disability; and life including term, whole life, and mortgage. For more information visit www.ctlowndes.com

name: Scottsdale Loan Company
description:
Scottsdale Loan Company is the best pawn shop in all of Scottsdale, specializing in high-value items. We'll buy your valuable watches(such as Rolex, Breitling), art, jewelry, gold, diamonds and collectibles. We also offer auto title loans for any amount, and will give you the most money at our pawn shop than all of Scottsdale.


Scottsdale Loan will buy your valuable watches, including Rolex and Breitling, and will also buy your art, jewelry, gold or silver, diamonds, and any other valuables you have. You will get top dollar at our pawn shop, and if you need fast cash, get a pawn loan and keep your item. You can even get an auto title loan and get all the cash you need up to $1,000,000 and still keep your car! Come visit our pawn shop today.


We'll even buy your electronics. If you have a TV, Computer, laptop, whatever it is, we will buy it for you. If you don't want to part with your item, then you can get a pawn loan through us for whatever you have. Bring your gold, silver, bullion, or electronics down today, and leave with cash on the spot!

name: Upstream Life Insurance Company
description: Upstream Life Insurance Company is a leading US insurance organization. Founded in 1912 and domiciled in Dallas, Texas, today Upstream member companies provide annuities, life insurance and other financial services to customers in more than 24 jurisdictions. These offerings include products and services that help businesses and individuals protect their assets, manage risks and provide for retirement security.

name: Capital Bank, a division of Chemung Canal Trust Company
description:
Capital Bank opened for business on Wolf Road in the Town of Colonie in December of 1995. The Bank was founded by a group Albany-based business people and community leaders. The founders knew there was a niche for a new commercial bank in the Capital Region. Over the next 15 years, the forecast of the founders came to fruition, as Capital Bank continued to grow and expand. On October 15, 2010, it was announced that Capital Bank would soon be joining forces with a bank in the Southern Tier of New York State, Chemung Canal Trust Company. The new Capital Bank opened on April 11, 2011, and began with its new service promise: Platinum Promise.


Chemung Canal Trust Company is a full-service community bank headquartered in Elmira, New York, and features a full-service wealth management operation. Chemung Canal is the oldest independent community bank in New York.

Chemung Canal Trust Company has offices in Broome, Cayuga, Chemung, Cortland, Schuyler, Seneca, Steuben, Tioga and Tompkins counties in New York, and Bradford County in Pennsylvania.

name: BayCoast Mortgage Company, LLC
description: BayCoast Mortgage, LLC is a full service lender providing industry best solutions in residential purchase, refinance, renovation, and construction loans. Our product offering complements customers throughout the East Coast including FNMA, FHLC, VA, FHA, Jumbo, MA Housing, RI Housing and BayCoast Portfolio . Being uniquely owned by BayCoast Bank, a community savings bank established in 1851, we have the flexibility to offer superior service, product mix, and pricing in a boutique feel that separates us from our big box competitors. We welcome the opportunity to complement any scenario with a common sense approach, which is truly representative of our customer-centric mindset. NMLS ID: 1082048

name: Steben & Company
description:
Steben & Company is a leading alternative asset manager. We specialize in multi-manager products including a fund of hedge funds and managed futures strategies. Our investment philosophy is defined by high conviction, actively managed exposures with a focus on more liquid, lower beta strategies. Our funds are designed to provide investors with the potential benefits of diversification and absolute returns regardless of market direction.


We seek to employ a repeatable investment process that incorporates rigorous due diligence, manager selection, portfolio construction and ongoing risk monitoring. Through our unique combination of resources and capabilities, Steben offers financial advisors and investors distinguished investment opportunities that have traditionally been limited to institutional investors.


Steben is an alternative investments innovator with more than 25 years of continuous operating experience.

name: Insurance Network America, a Simplicity Company
description:
Insurance Network America is an independent resource for agents to obtain solution oriented products to offer their clients and prospects. Independent agents dont need more companies trying to force products upon them, but need a partner to help find the best solutions for their clients and prospects so they can build their business.
Insurance Network America was founded in 1987 and quickly became one of the premier, privately owned small group health insurance wholesalers in the country. For more than 14 years, INA has been the largest independent distributor for one major small group health carrier and is currently the largest distributor for another. And, INA is gaining recognition throughout the country as a privately owned, significant distributor of quality annuity, life insurance and long term care insurance.


Note: The views, opinions, and information expressed on this site by third-party individuals do not represent the views of Insurance Network America and should not be construed as endorsement completeness of any third-party information.

name: Loudoun Mutual Insurance Company
description: We are a mutual insurance company owned by and operated for the benefit of our Virginia policyholders since 1849. We specialize in Homeowners, Dwelling Properties, Farmowners, Personal Umbrella, Church Package, Bed & Breakfast, and Commercial Property risks.

name: Medicus Insurance Company
description: Medicus Insurance Company is one of the NORCAL Group of companies. NORCAL Group is now part of ProAssurance. For the latest updates, follow ProAssurance.

name: American Reliable Insurance Company
description:
American Reliable's Farm, Ranch, and Equine business concentrates on providing coverage for farms, ranches, and all aspects of the equine industry, including mortality.


Our broad offering of insurance products are available in 48 states via i-Reli, a 24/7 online policy administration system. 


American Reliable maintains a group rating of A (Excellent) by AM Best.

name: Commerce West Insurance, a MAPFRE Company
description:
Commerce West Insurance Company was founded in California in 1948, initially offering Personal Lines Automobile insurance. In 1999, we introduced our monoline Commercial Automobile product. Currently, we offer Private Passenger Automobile Plans, both Preferred and Non-Standard, as well as a monoline Commercial Automobile Plan. Our products are offered through Independent Agents throughout California, Oregon and Arizona. 


Consistently, we are recognized for excellent service to our Producers and to our Customers. We are a member of The Commerce Group, Inc., of Webster, MA, with over $4.6 billion in assets. Commerce West is rated "A+" (Superior) by A.M. Best and ranks as one of the top 50 automobile insurance companies in California. Our objective is to grow incrementally and profitably and continue to be a stable market with excellent results. 


Our Home Office is located in Pleasanton, CA.

name: Independent Settlement Services, LLC, a Radian company
description:
In the next several months, we will be transitioning to One Radian brand. You can continue following us at @Radian and learn more about all of Radians new service offerings at radian.com.


Independent Settlement Services, LLC, a Radian company (Independent) has been dedicated to serving our clients in the real estate finance industry since 2005. We deliver best-in-class national appraisal and title management services with a commitment to outstanding service. We hold ourselves accountable to exceed the highest standards in compliance and quality. Our compliant nationwide service meets the fulfillment needs of mortgage originators, mortgage servicers, quality control companies, due diligence firms and other institutions involved in the real estate finance industry. Our commitment to add value to our clients extends beyond just our comprehensive product and service offering. To deliver superior results to our clients, Independent combines best-in-class technology with an experienced staff and an extensive vendor network. We promise results to keep you compliant throughout the process. Independent is committed to advancing your strategic goals while saving you time, money and resources.

name: BankCard USA Merchant Services, a Quistive Company
description: BankCard USA, a Quisitive company, is a credit card processing company that specializes in new or existing businesses. We offer a complete one step process for accepting card payments including retail storefront, mail-order, phone-order, tradeshows, professionals, service industry, home-based, and internet businesses. Weve been in business since 1993 and have an A rating with the Better Business Bureau. BankCard USA was acquired by Quisitive, a leader in cloud and payments solutions, in 2021.

name: Next Generation Trust Company
description:
Founded on the philosophy that every person should have control over their own retirement plans, Next Generation Trust Company educates consumers and professionals about self-directed retirement plans and nontraditional investments, a strategy at one time reserved only for the very wealthy.


Next Generation Trust Company, a custodian of self-directed retirement plans, is a trust company chartered in South Dakota. Its sister firm, Next Generation Services provides comprehensive account administration and transaction support with Next Generation Trust Company acting as custodian for all accounts. The neutral third-party professionals at Next Generation Trust Company expertly guide clients and their trusted advisors as part of their white glove, personalized service for a seamless transaction experience from start to finish.


Next Generation Trust Company serves clients globally via its website, www.NextGenerationTrust.com. For more information on self-directing a retirement plan, call 888-857-8058 (toll free), or e-mail Info@NextGenerationTrust.com.

name: Alliance Trust Company of Nevada
description:
Alliance Trust Company of Nevada works with attorneys, financial advisors, CPAs, and insurance professionals from around the world to provide flexible trustee services and the benefits of Nevada trust situs.


Founded in 2005, Alliance Trust Company of Nevada is fully independent and 100% employee-owned.
As a firm established by independent advisors, for advisors, we offer flexible trustee services to various allied professionals locally, nationally, and internationally.


Alliance Trust Company is an independent trust company  not a subsidiary or affiliate of any brokerage house, insurance company, or bank. We engage our clients and their established teams of professionals without interference.


Nevada leads the nation in both domestic and global asset protection and wealth management. We help our clients benefit from Nevadas favorable trust laws through a variety of trustee services and asset management.

name: Porter and Company
description:
For over 25 years, Porter Stansberry has built a reputation for doing some of
the most important work in the financial advisory business. Such as predicting the collapse of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, the bankruptcy of GM, the demise of GE, as well as exposing the myth of Peak Oil.


Along the way, Porter has also directed his readers to rare growth stock opportunities, often years before mainstream pundits. Stocks such as Amazon in 1997 when it traded for pocket change Illumina in 2002 under $3 a share Microsoft in 2006 at around $25 a share Shopify and Nvidia in 2016 when shares changed hands for $29 and $12 respectively, to name just a few.


We invite you take full advantage of Porters free recommendations and
insights until youre comfortable enough to upgrade and reward yourself with
the highest conviction and most timely ideas from Porter and his network.

name: Insurance Company of Florida
description:
Welcome to the Insurance Company of Florida
Proudly Serving Tampa, Brandon, Zephyrhills, Wesley Chapel, and Land O Lakes, FL!
Do you want an insurance agency that has a vested interest in its clients? Agents who were born and raised in your area and understand your specific insurance needs? Then you need Insurance Company of Florida!






At Insurance Company of Florida, we care about our clients. We work hard to ensure that you and your family are protected. We have access to multiple carriers, which means not only can we take care of all of your Florida personal and business insurance needs, but we can also shop around for prices that fit your budget. Whether you need auto insurance in Tampa, business insurance in Brandon, or home insurance in Wesley Chapel, we have got you covered!


Don't waste another minute with an agency that doesn't understand you. Contact us today for more information on all of the Tampa Florida insurance products available to you!

name: Highview National Insurance Company
description:
There are beliefs about Insurance Companies that don't apply to Highview National Insurance Company.


Some insurance companies,
_ Inflate how much a claim will cost _ the higher your loss experience the higher your policy cost is.
_ Dont invite risk managers to partner with them _ making it difficult to keep costs down.
_ Dont properly investigate claims _ resulting in costly mistakes.


Highview National Insurance Company works to counter this claim.
_ Its not about fighting the claim, its about managing it well.


Our mission is to provide coverage that benefits the insured.


This is how its done:


__ Customizing insurance policies.
__ Strategizing on minimizing risk exposure.
__ Adapting to the fast-changing marketplace.
__ Educating employers in proper safety protocols.
__ Collaborating effectively with our clients.
__ Identifying fraudulent claims.
__ Managing authentic claims.


The least expensive claim is a prevented claim. That is the goal of Highview National Insurance Co. - Made possible with our guidance and support


However, claims happen. For best results, we manage all aspects lowering your cost.




Looking for an insurance carrier that backs the policy sold to you?
Highview National Insurance Company perfectly matches that description.


What drives us?


Decades of experience in risk management and brokering workers compensation policies.
Being constantly let down by carriers solely interested in selling policies without the insureds best interest in mind.


This always puts a strain on both the insured-client and broker-client relationships. 


Highview National Insurance Company is determined to change that.


We know that more is gained when insurance companies collaborate with brokers, risk managers, and insureds. 


__ Highview was born to fill a void in the industry for a better future. __


Want to hear more?


Email us: info@highviewnational.com


Ready to team up?


Email us: info@highviewnational.com

name: Ventanex, a REPAY Company
description:
Ventanex was acquired by REPAY, a leading provider of vertically-integrated payment solutions, in February 2020. 


REPAY's payment technology helps companies serve customers better and be more profitable through the integrated, intelligent management of inbound payments, outbound payments, and consumer messaging.


Our proprietary, cloud-based transaction management platform is powerful, flexible, and customizable. Through a single convenient portal, clients have real-time visibility into the entire lifecycle of a payment or messagewith ironclad data security, built-in regulatory compliance, and comprehensive tracking and analytics.


REPAY is a public company listed on the Nasdaq Stock Market under the ticker symbol RPAY and has been a certified Great Place to Work since 2017. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, GA, and has offices in Bettendorf, IA; Chattanooga, TN; Chicago, IL; Dallas, TX; East Moline, IL; Fort Worth, TX; Mesa, AZ; Phoenix, AZ; Salt Lake City, UT; and Sarasota, FL. For more information, visit www.repay.com. 


Visit www.repay.com to learn more.

name: Clear Lake Bank & Trust Company
description:
Despite many bank mergers and acquisitions in recent years, Clear Lake Bank and Trust Company continues to be a strong, stable, and independent locally-owned bank. We pride ourselves on a genuine commitment to our employees and our communities, celebrating 84 years of business in North Iowa. 


At Clear Lake Bank & Trust, we go to great lengths to hire the best people. As a result, we have been named among Iowa's Top Workplaces in the small business category for eight years. We are proud to be one of only 7 companies in the state to have received this recognition since the award's inception.


Clear Lake Bank & Trust serves North Iowa with four offices in Clear Lake, Garner, and Mason City, Iowa.

name: Workmen's Auto Insurance Company
description:
Workmen's Auto Insurance Company has been steering drivers in the right direction since 1949. Backed by Mercury Insurance Group, we are headquartered in Brea California and are dedicated to serving the non-standard auto market throughout the state. 


Whether your driving history is first class or has a few bumps in the road, our products provide several coverages, ranging from liability only to full coverage with physical damage. Our personal lines automobile insurance is distributed through independent agents.

name: Totura & Company
description:
We proudly offer specialty claims adjusting services for all lines/types of Property, Casualty and Liability claims. Our claim assignments originate from traditional Domestic insurance carriers, Start-up carriers, as well as Excess and Surplus lines carriers, London Syndicates, Third Party Administrators, Self- Insured Entities and City and State Municipalities. 


Totura & Company offers adjusting services in the state of Florida and Georgia. Our team is dedicated in providing excellent customer service that will exceed your expectations. We continue to grow by embracing progressive change based on the needs of our clients and employees. We believe this means that you can expect us to provide you and your company the kind of service that builds relationships. We enjoy a diversified and large client base built on loyalty from over 39 years of exceptional claims service. 


Totura and Company is here to protect our valued clients interests by providing prompt fair and personalized service. We look for new ways to meet your needs every day. From utilizing the latest in hi-tech claims management to hiring experienced and seasoned property and liability adjusters. 


Totura and Company is also dedicated to hiring and retaining the best and most experienced claims professionals in the industry. All of our current and future employees are key members of TEAM TOTURA and pivotal contributors in our success over the past 39 years. During that time, we significantly outperformed the industry in a number of ways. You have helped to lead us to success. We're dedicated to a culture and environment that provides challenging, interesting work and encourages you to grow and to enjoy what you do. We commit to providing you a work environment that supports you.


Whether you are a client or an employee, thank you for choosing Totura & Company!

name: Wilson Holding Company
description: The Wilson Holding Company is the holding company behind the several operating assets of the Wilson family including Wilson.Training, Wilson.Data, Wilson.Conferences, and the many media assets and products/services being offered in those areas such as PrivateEquity.com, the Family Offices Group, Family Office Database, over 23 training programs including the Qualified Family Office Professional, & Certified Hedge Fund Professional, and many books, videos and thought leadership resources.

name: Cravens Warren & Company
description:
Cravens Warren has been serving the insurance needs of Texans since 1946. We are a full service agency, representing numerous insurance companies for Personal Lines, Commercial Lines, Surety Bonds, and Life & Health Insurance.


Locally owned and operated, our staff of over 30 experienced and credentialed professionals are committed to carefully serving our customers' needs. We are large enough to provide a full range of products and services, but not so large as to forget to attend to each client individually.


Cravens Warren pledges to always put your needs and interests above our own, and to maintain the highest standards of professionalism and integrity. By doing so, we have enjoyed long term relationships with very satisfied customers.


Cravens Warren knows that any agent can sell insurance. Our strategy is to help you identify and reduce your risks before approaching the insurance companies on your behalf. By improving your Risk Profile we can create a feeding frenzy in the insurance marketplace which drives down your insurance costs. 


Cravens/Warren is a proud member of Combined Agents of America, LLC. These agents share a common commitment to strengthening the independent insurance agency system through profitable growth, quality and service.

name: CS Insurance Strategies, a Marsh & McLennan Agency LLC company
description: CS Insurance Strategies, a Marsh & McLennan Agency LLC company, is a full-service brokerage helping clients navigate complicated risk and insurance issues. Founded in 2009 by CEO Charles Smith, CS Insurance Strategies is a minority-owned brokerage providing employee health and benefits, business insurance, and risk management consulting services to organizations of all sizes. While CS Insurance Strategies serve clients in all industries across the US, their specialized expertise lies in municipal, non-profit, and minority-owned businesses.

name: Germantown Mutual Insurance Company
description:
Germantown Mutual Insurance Company has been an important business in Wisconsin for over 150 years. On April 1, 1854, just six years after Wisconsin had received its statehood, the Germantown Farmers Mutual Insurance Company was established as the first mutual insurance company in Wisconsin. The original officers and agents were prominent local leaders and dedicated to the development of the Germantown area.


As the company grew, its office was housed in a number of different locations in Germantown. The newest building was completed in 1997 and allows for continued expansion.


The need for the new office building was a direct result of the continued growth and prosperity of Germantown Mutual Insurance Company. In the last few years the company has added several new lines of business such as Auto, Businessowners, and Farm. Through multiple mergers, it has acquired five other insurance companies: City of Waukesha Mutual, Cedarburg Mutual, Lakeland Mutual, Menomonee Mutual and Retail Lumbermens Mutual. As a result of the acquisitions and new lines of business, Germantown Mutual has grown from a $5,000,000 company in 1993 to just over $50,000,000 in Written Premium in 2015.

name: Maison Insurance Company
description: Maison Insurance Company is an admitted property and casualty insurance company domiciled in Louisiana. We provide HO3 (homeowner), DP3 (dwelling), Flood Coverage, Wind/Hail only, and Manufactured Home products. Maison Insurance writes business throughout the states of Louisiana, Texas, and Florida through our network of qualified and experienced independent agents.

name: Motorists Mutual Insurance Company
description:
Motorists Mutual is a member of Motorists Insurance Group. 


Headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, Motorists Insurance Group is a regional insurance carrier that includes 11 property and casualty, life insurance and insurance brokerage companies. 


The group provides insurance solutions through 14,000 agents in 24 states across the Midwest, Northeast and South. Motorists Insurance Group strives to be the most trusted and responsive carrier in the independent agency system, and is rated A (Excellent) by A.M. Best, the leading provider of insurer ratings.

name: Kontrol Payables, a REPAY Company
description:
Kontrol was acquired by REPAY, a leading provider of vertically-integrated payment solutions, in June 2021. 


REPAY's payment technology helps companies serve customers better and be more profitable through the integrated, intelligent management of inbound payments, outbound payments, and consumer messaging.


Our proprietary, cloud-based transaction management platform is powerful, flexible, and customizable. Through a single convenient portal, clients have real-time visibility into the entire lifecycle of a payment or messagewith ironclad data security, built-in regulatory compliance, and comprehensive tracking and analytics.


REPAY is a public company listed on the Nasdaq Stock Market under the ticker symbol RPAY and has been a certified Great Place to Work since 2017. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, GA, and has offices in Bettendorf, IA; Chattanooga, TN; Chicago, IL; Dallas, TX; East Moline, IL; Fort Worth, TX; Mesa, AZ; Phoenix, AZ; Salt Lake City, UT; and Sarasota, FL. For more information, visit www.repay.com. 


Visit www.repay.com to learn more.

name: Mennonite Mutual Insurance Company
description: We are an insurance carrier that offers our property & casualty products through professional, independent agencies to policyholders throughout Ohio and Indiana. Mennonite Mutual Insurance Company has a Best's Rating of A- (Excellent) and specializes in niche insurance products for churches, faith-based organizations, farms and agribusinesses.

name: Texas Treasury Safekeeping Trust Company
description:
The Texas Treasury Safekeeping Trust Company is a special purpose trust company whose mission is to preserve and grow the State's financial resources by competitively managing and investing them in a prudent, ethical, innovative and cost-effective manner while focusing on client needs.


We have hired candidates from all over the United States and abroad. A strong organization with a great culture, we are located in Austin, Texas, a city that has frequently been ranked number one in best places to live in America. Why? Job prospects, quality of life, affordability. Many call it the music capital of the world, with festivals like South by Southwest (SXSW) and Austin City Limits which draw afficionados from the world over. And as a state agency, we are a part of the Employees Retirement System of Texas (ERS). The work is engaging, and the benefits package is excellent!

name: Seven Seas Insurance Company
description: Seven Seas Insurance Company specializes in cargo insurance. Delivering supreme claim service is our commitment and the foundation of our reputation. We have been offering cargo insurance since 1967. Our underwriting expertise within the ocean, air and inland marine cargo market allows us to deliver prompt results with a personalized touch.

name: Gateway Underwriters Agency, A Berkshire Hathaway Company
description:
Gateway Underwriters Agency is a professional wholesale insurance agency and a proud member of the Berkshire Hathaway Group. We are a sales and underwriting organization committed to partnerships with our retailers and working together to mutually grow our businesses. 


Gateway is defined by the quality of our business relationships. This is what makes us different from our competitors and why you should make us your first choice in wholesalers!




Our Promise to You:


We promise a same day/next day response to you on:
 Submissions
 Bind Requests
 Endorsement Requests
 Phone calls and emails
 Our quotes also provide you with information to help you make the sale with a complete list of forms and endorsements included with the quote. Additionally, on many products you will also receive claim examples, coverage highlights, and marketing material. 
 We want to come out and visit you and learn about your business. 
 We want to earn your respect and your business. 
 We want to be measured on the value we deliver
 We will help you keep your business once you write it, so renewal quotes are delivered to you 30 days before the expiration date.








Building effective business relationships to grow your business!

name: Allen Trust Company
description: Allen Trust Company, a trust-only bank, is a Portland-based company with offices in Oregon, Washington and Alaska. In 2001, Stuart B. Allen founded the firm on the principles of being locally-owned, remaining independent, and providing highest-quality, personalized service. name: Southern Mutual Church Insurance Company
description:
Since 1928, the Southern Mutual Church Insurance family has worked with policyholders as partners in faith and in serving Gods church. 


From those humble beginnings, Southern Mutuals family has grown to serve more than 11,000 churches across many denominations and states. As a testament to our commitment and dedication to our churches, our very first policyholder remains insured with us to this day. 


SMCI has received high financial ratings by both A.M. Best Company and Demotech Inc. Another assurance of solid, reliable protection for your church.


Today SMCI has more than $11 billion property coverage in force, annual written premiums of more than $56 million, policyholder reserves of more than $53 million, and more than 19,000 policies across many denominations.


SMCI provides policies in South Carolina, North Carolina, Georgia, Tennessee, Kentucky, Virginia. Coming in April 2022 to West Virginia. 


SMCI offers Property and Liability coverage, Business Automobile policies, Workers Compensation coverage, and Umbrella liability coverage, as well as, other specialty products and services unique to meet the specific needs of churches.

name: Time Investment Company
description:
Time Investment Company is a third party lender. A family owned and operated business since 1981; we pride ourselves on providing exceptional personalized Raving Fan customer service to all of our dealers, loan and subordinated note holders. Because we are licensed to only do business through organizations (Dealers or distributors) who assign contracts to us, we cannot and do not provide personal loans directly to individuals. A foundational cornerstone to our success is the fact that we pride ourselves on developing and cultivating loyal long-term relationships. Because we are a relational company, we practice referral marketingwith 95% of our customers coming exclusively from word-of-mouth referrals.
Time Investment Companys Mission Statement is To improve the quality of life through excellence in customer care. To this end we are committed to help improve the quality of life for our dealers, distributors, loan holders and investors by providing tailored sales financing programs allowing consumers the ability to buy high quality home products through affordable monthly payments with an experienced team who are committed to providing a customer centered experience.


TIC prides itself as a practitioner of Common Sense Lending which we have been doing since our inception, servicing some of the top companies in their industries. Our team of 40 plus employees see ourselves as a small company with a big heart, continuing to build on our historical reputation for personalizing our relationships with our customers.
This is a finance company in a class all of its own!

name: The Kidder Company
description: The Kidder Company, a branch of the Ask Kidder companies, provides comprehensive business, 401(k), and benefit solutions. We are the experts in helping to build a better financial future for businesses and individuals in obtaining financial health.

M&A assignments are both sell- and buy-side, and private placements include raising equity from venture capital and private equity firms as well as arranging debt with a variety of lenders, including banks and other non-bank lenders, insurance companies, mezzanine funds, and many types of specialty finance companies.

name: Delaware Trust Company
description:
Headquartered in Wilmington, DE - Delaware Trust Company provides clients with a comprehensive range of independent and conflict-free corporate trust and agency services. Delaware Trust is not affiliated with any bank, lender, or other third party and is regulated by the Delaware State Bank Commissioner and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. 


Why Choose Delaware Trust:


 Independence: We are not affiliated with any lending institution, law firm or investment advisory firm, minimizing the likelihood of conflict of interest.


 Flexibility: We are free of the layers of bureaucracy that tie the hands of many larger institutions. We will consider every transaction. 


 Responsiveness: When you contact a member of our team, you can expect a quick reply. Our clients know they can count on us when time is of the essence. 


 Expertise: We have provided customized solutions for more than two decades. Our staff of seasoned attorneys, certified public accountants and finance professionals is ready to serve you. 


 Stability: As a privately held company, our view of risk does not fluctuate with market conditions. Our focus is on the long term, not quarter to quarter. We are backed by one of the largest service companies in the industry. 


 Capability: We are the premier independent provider of solutions for the structured finance, corporate restructuring, real estate, domestic and international tax, private placements and M&A markets. Our service offerings span trust and agency, special purpose vehicle management, and independent director services.

description:
Blockchain Technology is the most advanced tech on the planet right now . Our entire ecosystem is thriving towards it. One of the biggest challenges in this ecosystem is the right skillset . If we need to adapt this technology , we need skilled people. The Demand For Blockchain Engineers Is Skyrocketing, But we do not enough resources as per Forbes. Hence we need to create the resource by educating people not just by training on different programs but also enabling them . The biggest problem in the entire ecosystem is that Blockchain is not just some tech its an ecosystem which we are calling Internet 3.0 and we need to build the ecosystem by all possible ways. 


DIYblockchain is not just going to train people but will enable the makers culture in the blockchain . DIYblockchain is going to nurture the audience in blockchain globally by training them , giving them a platform to get there hands dirty, allowing them to showcase there skills by incubating and also building year long programs to build the ecosystem. DIYblockchain will also run a dedicated space for incubating young talent where they will be rigorously trained and will be provided with all the necessary resources to touch the sky and sky is the limit.
