name: Louben Investment Company LLC
description:
Louben Investment Company, LLC is an American multinational financial services company. Founded in 1999 by Benjamin Friedman, the company has more than 450 employees, with corporate headquarters in Colorado, operational headquarters in Chicago, and offices throughout North America, Asia, and Europe. Founder, CEO, and Co-CIO Benjamin Friedman owns approximately 85% of the firm.


Louben's teams employ their deep expertise to invest in the equity and equity-linked securities of companies across the globe. We seek to generate alpha by combining fundamental stock selection with proprietary analytical methodologies grounded in rigorous risk management.


Partnering with Investor Relations


Louben Investment Company, LLC invests in Aerospace, Transport, Computer, Telecommunications, Agriculture, Construction, Education, Pharmaceuticals, Food, Health Care, Hospitality, Energy, Manufacturing, Mining, Financials, Industrials, Media and Entertainment, and Technology sectors. Participating in thousands of company meetings annually across the globe, we believe in engaging with the companies we analyze and invest with.


Fixed Income & Macro


Who we are


Louben's Fixed Income and Macro team seek to generate alpha by investing in fixed income securities in global markets using macro and relative value strategies. As one of Louben's longest-standing strategies, our team's investment process blends quantitative analysis, fundamental research, and experienced judgment.


How we do it


Louben's Fixed Income and Macro team collaborate with a disciplined investment process within a rigorous analytical framework. Leveraging its in-depth understanding of central banks and partnerships with leading economists, our expertise spans macro views, monetary policy, and the intersection of public and proprietary data. Our trading and research team constantly originates, analyzes, and evaluates new opportunities using qualitative and quantitative methods.

name: Heist Insurance Agency, an Alera Group Company
description:
Who We Are ... and How We Are Different 
In today's business environment, you have to be a little better than your competition in order to survive. We think we are. 


Our Focus On Programs
As in any business, you need to understand your customer needs. We take this seriously. Only when we understand your specific concerns and exposures to loss can we recommend a viable and affordable solution. Our access to many insurance programs that are often designed by people in your industry gives us a coverage and a price advantage.


Our Focus On People
Knowledge is the key that can unlock any door. Our service team is committed to staying up to date in all areas that affect our clients. Our commitment to the most up to date technology gives us the tools to provide service quickly and efficiently.


Our Focus On You
Our clients are the reason that we are in business. This simple philosophy keeps our focus and priorities on you. Our services can range from offering technical advice on a complex insurance concern to meeting with you any time of the day or night.


We have over fifty years of business experience, financially strong carriers, and an attitude to be the best. We are confident that you will only benefit by considering our services when your business, personal life, disability, health or employee benefits insurance expires.


The Entire Thomas H. Heist Insurance Service Team

name: Inheritance Funding Company, Inc.
description: For over 25 years, Inheritance Funding Company, Inc. (IFC) has provided capital advances to heirs waiting for their inheritance distribution. With over $200 million advanced to thousands of heirs in all 50 states, IFC is the oldest and largest provider of Inheritance Advances in the country.

name: Younan Company
description: Younan Company is a global, private equity firm that specializes in acquisitions of assets and companies to complement its global luxury brand. The American-owned company headquartered in Southern California was founded in 2001 by Zaya S. Younan, Chairman and CEO of Younan Collection and Younan Properties. The companys vision is to acquire a portfolio of luxury properties and companies while building a world-class luxury lifestyle brand.

name: PanAfrican Investment Company
description: Established in 2012 and led by Dana Reed, PanAfrican Investment Company (PIC) is a private investment firm founded by Richard Parsons and Ronald Lauder with the mandate to invest in companies which operate in Sub-Saharan Africa. Headquartered in New York City, PIC holds investments in Ghana, Kenya, Rwanda and Nigeria. PIC seeks to create value by bringing operational expertise through the active oversight and monitoring of its portfolio companies. Our mission is to identify, invest in and provide solutions that affect growth and development in sub-Saharan Africa. As PIC invests, Africa profits.

name: Universal Fire & Casualty Insurance Company
description:
Universal Fire & Casualty Insurance Company (UFCIC) currently underwrites commercial property, general liability, business owners package (BOP), commercial multi-peril (CMP), and inland marine products. UFCIC targets those risks that are managed in such a way that they deserve to qualify for, and enjoy, the additional advantages in security and coverage offered by an admitted product.


While the surplus market, as a last resort channel, can provide a reduced coverage form at a higher price to profitably underwrite risks declined by the admitted market, UFCIC turns this dynamic upside down. Via a higher standard of acceptance, expert underwriting rules, advanced analytics, and external data sources to supplement standard risk information, the majority of UFCICs target business can graduate from the surplus lines and be provided with a superior coverage form in the admitted marketplace.


While many admitted insurers risk appetites ebb and flow in tandem and find themselves chasing the same risks based on price, UFCICs target is that overlooked small well managed business that is stable, has consistent operations, has proven concern with risk management, a demonstrated ability to finance and maintain its operations, and has management and ownership with experience and quality of character.


UFCICs risk selection and underwriting process is rigorous and facilitated by cutting-edge technology that our distributors use via a web-based portal to rate, quote, bind, and issue the policy through an approval process overseen by complex business rules, automation, and overseen by state-of-the-art artificial intelligence, Big Data, and underwriter assisted processes.

name: Forum, an Alera Group Company
description:
Forum opened in 1999 as Palmetto Benefit Management. After almost 15 years in the industry, and tremendous growth, we re-branded in 2014 to better align our image to the changing face of health care. 
In December of 2016, we along with 24 other independent agencies nationwide, formed a new company called Alera Group. 
Since then, Alera Group has grown to over 100 firms nationally, with almost 2,000 employees.
Forum is proud to be a founding member of Alera Group and looks forward to pairing our National Capabilities with our Local Delivery for the benefit of our valued clients.

name: SPECTRUM Commercial Services Company
description:
Since 1995, SPECTRUM Commercial Services Company has offered Asset-Based Loans and Accounts Receivable Financing services nationwide for Companies needing from $250,000 to $7 million.


Asset-Based Loans
Asset-Based Loans are revolving lines of credit made to companies that cannot obtain adequate bank financing due to rapid growth, restructurings, or other special circumstances. SPECTRUM can work around financial challenges which may trouble a bank by lending against accounts receivable, inventory, equipment and commercial real estate.


Accounts Receivable Financing
In our Accounts Receivable Financing programs, SPECTRUM buys commercial invoices, advancing up to 85% of the invoice to enhance a company's cash flow. As a part of this service, SPECTRUM provides credit granting support and collection expertise.


SPECTRUM
SPECTRUM has assisted many businesses during times of transition. The list of SPECTRUM clients that have become very successful companies is extremely long and we will gladly provide references upon request.


To discuss SPECTRUM's financial solutions further, we invite you to visit our website at www.SPECTRUMCommercial.com or call our main office number at 952-876-8222.

name: NLC Mutual Insurance Company
description:
In 1986, six state league-sponsored risk pools designed a member-owned captive reinsurance organization to meet turbulent market challenges. NLC Mutual Insurance Company (NLC Mutual) was founded to provide a stable reinsurance answer for public entities with the assistance of the National League of Cities (NLC).


Today, NLC Mutual is a dynamic pool of pools, a member-powered collaborative community comprised of 28 state league-sponsored risk pools, which provide insurance coverage for thousands of cities, towns, and villages in the United States. Through Board representation every member can influence the direction of the organization to ensure our common mission.


We understand the unique needs of public entity risk pools. Our staff has strong underwriting and actuarial expertise, and this knowledge allows us to price for the risk we assume, rather than a cyclical hard or soft market pricing. We support reinsurance coverage for liability, property, and workers compensation as well as additional specialty coverages and services.

name: Texas Bank Mortgage Company
description:
Texas Bank Mortgage is a branch of Texas Bank Financial. Information about Texas Bank Financial can be found at www.texas-bank.com


At Texas Bank Mortgage, we treat every customer as an individual, not a number and we don't place you into a loan profile, created by the banking industry. We use "common sense"_ and will help you obtain the best loan possible, for your particular situation. We have a wide range of programs and together we'll find the loan that's best suited for you. Not all buyers are created equal. If by chance you are not in a position to purchase a home right now, our experienced Loan Consultants can advise you on how to get "Mortgage Ready"_.


Not all buyers are alike, so finding the financial fit is important now and for the future. Call and talk to one of our professional Loan Consultants today. We've helped thousands find the key to homeownership and we can help you as well. Pre-qualifying is quick and easy. Within a few short minutes we can tell you how much you'll qualify for, what your out of pocket expenses will be, and a very close estimate for your monthly payments. We will advise you as if it were us buying a home and treat you the way we would want to be treated. Don't make shopping for a mortgage loan harder than it has to be, we will keep it simple and straight forward, and guide you through the whole loan process, from pre-qualifying to closing and beyond. We want to be your "Lender for Life."_


TEXAS BANK FINANCIAL dba TEXAS BANK MORTGAGE COMPANY IS REGISTERED WITH THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF SAVINGS AND MORTGAGE LENDING. NMLS COMPANY ID #410626. EQUAL HOUSING LENDER AND FDIC INSURED.

name: Sunstone Trust Company
description:

We are agile, flexible, and can serve client needs comprehensively or in partnership with their existing professional advisors. We enhance our partners relationships with their clients. We can work with clients who have complex needs and unusual or complex assets. We do not require account minimums.


Why do clients love us?


__We provide terrific service. Because we are small and agile, we make decisions quickly, we respond promptly, and are flexible and creative in meeting our clients needs. 


__We can be a corporate trustee for any trust, including Spousal Trusts, Dynasty Trusts, Life Insurance Trusts, Qualified Personal Residence Trusts, Charitable Lead Trusts, Charitable Remainder Trusts, Grantor Retained Annuity Trusts, and Special Needs Trusts.


__We can manage any asset, including stock and bond portfolios, commercial real estate, residential real estate, and private company stock.


__We offer our fiduciary clients access to our proprietary common trust funds.


__We understand immigrant communities. We are majority-owned by first- generation immigrants and we specialize in protecting the wealth and serving the interests of families and individuals who have immigrated to the United States or who desire to do so. Our personnel speak Chinese and Vietnamese and our website is available in English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Vietnamese.

name: Meritus Capital - Factoring Company
description:
Grow. Prosper. Evolve.


We have been in business for over 19 years and provided well over $1Bn in funding to businesses around the U.S and Canada. Specializing in invoice factoring and payroll funding we have created an online application that makes the process easier and quicker for new prospects to get approved and funded. We think actions speak loudest, so we are merging our years of success and experience with technology to make our funding a great fit for more businesses!


__ Are you in Staffing, Transportation, Oil & Gas, Manufacturing or in another B2B sector?


We have been in business for over 19 years specializing in these very businesses, providing them with over 1 Billion dollars in funding.


At Meritus, our mission is to actively hear and understand your business, get to know where your stresses are, and provide specialty finance solutions/advice to facilitate the growth of your business.


With our team of seasoned professionals, we combine creativity with experience to support the capital needs for high growth start-ups, mid sized companies taking advantage of strategic opportunities, and even to guide companies looking to make Merger & Acquisition decisions.


We offer more than just funding and advice, our business strategy is built around using our expertise and positive creativity to guide you through the financial maze to help you reach your goals.


Broker Programs:

name: Riverway Title Company
description: Riverway Title Company provides comprehensive title insurance, underwriting and closing services to the commercial and residential real estate industries and is committed to providing the highest quality title solutions regardless of the size or complexity of your real estate transaction. We value our customer relationships and continually work to maintain them through consistent, responsible and knowledgeable service. It is our goal to create a culture of support and teamwork among our clients and our associates. We can be reached at 713-266-2595 or info@riverwaytitle.com.

name: Umialik Insurance Company
description:
Umialik Insurance Company, founded in 1981, is an Anchorage-based company serving the auto, home, and commercial insurance needs of Alaskas residents and businesses. Umialik is a member of the Western National Insurance Group, a super-regional group of property-and-casualty insurance companies providing personal and commercial coverage in 20 states across the Midwestern and Western U.S. as well as in Alaska; and surety bonds in 32 states. Being a subsidiary of Western National Insurance Group gives us access to the financial resources that have earned the group an A+ (Superior) rating from A.M. Best Company and a place among the Ward's Top 50 group of property-and-casualty insurance companies (which recognizes superior financial performance and stability over the past five years).


Our insurance products and services allow individuals and businesses throughout our communities to have the peace of mind and financial security to focus on what is most important to them. Whether serving customers directly or working behind the scenes, every role at Umialik provides a valuable contribution in which you can take pride.


For more information about our career opportunities, please visit the Western National Insurance Group Careers page at http://www.wnins.com/careers/index.shtml.

name: eQRP Company
description:
Our mission is to empower people to transform their financial future by taking control of their retirement funds - funds that are currently stranded in 401(k) or IRA accounts.


Whether you want to invest in real estate, youre concerned about the upcoming financial crash, or you want to find a way to rollover your money tax and penalty free, you can access your money now.


Weve created retirement solutions and support giving you the ability for unlimited rollovers - tax free and penalty free! 


The eQRP is IRS approved and part of ERISA, the tax code that was established in 1974, over forty years ago. These solutions are trusted, secure and well documented.


Weve used our depth of knowledge and customer experience to create the eQRP, the ultimate investor tool for tax-free investing. We'll guide you to getting money you have stuck in old plans and self-directed IRAs both unstuck and under your control.

name: Accredited Surety and Casualty Company, Inc.

name: Digital Asset Custody Company (acquired by Bakkt)
description:
Institutional custody. Purpose built to protect. Contact us at info@digitalassetcustody.com.


DACC's SOC 1 certified custody service was built from the ground up to custody digital assets on behalf of institutional clients. Our management is an interdisciplinary team of highly accomplished founders with backgrounds in technology, finance, prime brokerage, regulatory compliance, national security and fintech.


With its proprietary technology, DACC is able to custody a wide range of cryptocurrencies, rapidly and securely egress digital assets out of air-gapped cold storage, and provide clients with 24/7 physical and digital security to safeguard their assets.


With thousands of hours of R&D designed for the most sophisticated clientele, DACC's goal is to lead product innovation with our client-centric, solutions-based philosophy.

name: American Community Mutual Insurance Company
description: For over 70 years, American Community has provided protection for healthcare expenses. description: Acceptance is a consumer finance company. We specialize in personal loans and retail financing for dealers. We have a reputation for providing great customers service. description: National Bank and Trust (a wholly owned subsidiary of NB&T Financial Group, Inc.) was founded in 1859 as a private banking company and chartered as a National bank in 1872. National Bank and Trust offers a broad range of financial services through its 22 locations in Ohio.

name: Insurance Management Company
description:
Insurance Management Company (IMC) has earned a national reputation for its unique business model for helping commercial, industrial and institutional clients better manage risk. Clients working closely with our associates, optimize the purchase of property, liability and workers compensation insurance. IMC achieves this through the combination of a uniquely-skilled team and a culture that stresses what would we do if it were our business. We believe our approach makes a difference that is valued by our clients.


IMCs approach is based upon starting with an in-depth understanding of its clients business and risk profile, and then helping to structure insurance policies that closely reflect the clients tolerance for risk. We have an all hands meeting daily to review current events, emerging issues, discuss client programs, and brainstorm solutions which allows us to respond quickly, we have a tremendous advantageand weve been doing it that way for 25+ years!


IMCs service philosophy is to treat our clients businesses as if they were our own, with the same passion and ongoing attention to detail, not just at renewal time but throughout the year. This is not a marketing pitch but, rather, the foundation of our business and the reason why IMC is the only agent in the country to have earned the Quality Award from the Risk and Insurance Management Society (RIMS), the nations largest association of corporate risk managers.


Website: www.imcerie.com

name: Assure America Title Company
description:
Since 2009, Assure America Title Company has been committed to providing reliable first-rate service at a low competitive cost. It is our goal to lead the closing process and guide you every step of the way. Our Closing and Management team is committed to our clients having a pleasant experience, and they pride themselves on overall client satisfaction. 
Services offered include: 
 Closing & Settlement Services

 Short Sale Facilitation 
Title Insurance rates are promulgated by each state. Ask if you are eligible for a Reissue Rate and you may be able to save money on your next closing. Well provide you with a title commitment within 1-2 business days. 
Assure America Title Company offers you a specialized REO Team that understands the work involved in closing bank-owned properties. Our dedication to providing the fastest and most reliable title searches in the industry allows you to close quickly and accurately. Our corporate office is based in Deerfield Beach, FL, and we have a fully staffed office in Coral Gables, FL and Pembroke Pines, FL, with closing locations set up throughout South Florida. Due to this agility, closings are always at your convenience.
Established in 2009 and earning the Old Republic Title Top 20 Agent Award for the last three years, Assure America Title Company is always growing and looking to expand its Escrow & Closing Team. Check out our Jobs page for more details.
COMMUNICATION 
Our offices are open from 9AM until our last scheduled closing is finished. On a personal level, our Management Team will always available for you, including nights and weekends. I know real estate never sleeps! 
KNOWLEDGE 
Surrounded by a team of the best in the business, we are confident we will find a solution to any problem. 
LEADERSHIP 
We say Closing Process Leadership because we will lead and manage the entire closing process from start to finish

name: Trust Company of the South
description:
Trust Company of the South is a North Carolina independent trust company providing premier investment managment, wealth planning, and fiduciary services to maximize wealth for high-net-worth individuals and institutions.


How we are different:


We are a privately-owned firm, with a majority of the firm owned by employees. This enables us to take a long view in how we manage the firm, rather than the quarter-to-quarter approach of large, publicly-traded Wall Street firms. As the financial crises of 2008 showed, the interests of large Wall Street firms are often at odds with those of their clients.


We serve all our clients in a fiduciary capacity. We always have and always will put the interest of our clients ahead of our own. We will always operate in a fully transparent manner, disclosing all fees. Unlike the brokerage firm structure, we work for you, our client, and we are only compensated by you. We receive no fee or commission from any providers or funds we may recommend.


A sound financial plan is the foundation of a successful and secure financial future. Wealth management is far more involved than merely managing money. Our combined talents and expertise enable us to provide comprehensive, holistic and objective counsel and guidance to the multitude of issues that surround building and monitoring a financial plan that will change as your life changes.


We view our clients as partners and as such, look for relationships that will be mutually rewarding and long-term. Our clients tend to be interesting, successful people who would rather pursue their passions and leave the details and heavy-lifting of managing their wealth in more capable hands.

name: Winter-Dent & Company
description: Winter-Dent is a large regional insurance agency, serving clients in Missouri, throughout the United States, and around the world. We have specialized service divisions in insurance and risk, bonds, employee benefits, and financial services. Our clients range from individuals to some of the largest businesses in the areas we serve. Our goal is to become each clients most trusted advisor and to provide valuable resources and services beyond product placement. We begin by allowing a client to rely on us as a resource and advisor. Over time, this enables us to build trust and a long-lasting relationship with the client and makes us more than just a place to buy insurance. Our people maintain high levels of expertise in their fields of specialty. We encourage and support ongoing efforts to acquire professional knowledge and to achieve excellence. We have local ownership, so our agents live in the communities they serve. This increases our agents knowledge and ability to deliver strategic and exhaustive solutions. We do not try to be all things to all people but strive to meet the needs of the people we serve. Our team of professionals dedicated to the unique needs of their particular groups of clients embody our core philosophy of serving the client first and distinguish us in our service areas and in our industry.

description:

Within this niche space, we provide full-service brokerage and centralized execution infrastructure for Commodity Trading Advisors in the management of their clients futures accounts. We ensure advisors also have proper giveup infrastructure to allow ease of incorporating asset allocations where the allocators/investors may utilize different FCM/IB/Custodial relationships. This includes emerging CTA's where we provide a solid foundation for their future growth and provide guidance with many aspects of the business with inclusion of other industry leaders. We are a team player - we gladly introduce CTA's to as many Family Offices, Institutional Investors, and other Introducing Brokers as possible, and work with all additional service providers the CTA's may utilize.


We also serve as an Introducing Broker for Institutions, Family Offices, and Professionals who trade in the futures markets for their own accounts. Given our high level of industry knowledge through these functions, we additionally introduce qualified investors to the managed futures industry and assist with advisor search & selection, due diligence, and implementation.

description:
Welcome to ISBA Mutual


ISBA Mutual was formed 33 years ago through the efforts of Illinois lawyers banding together to help one another by establishing our own insurance company. Our company has grown to be one of the most significant providers of lawyer's malpractice insurance in Illinois.


We specialize in professional liability insurance written specifically and exclusively for the needs of Illinois attorneys. It's our only business.

name: Linden Thomas & Company
description:
At Linden Thomas & Company, our mission is to provide clients with the most efficient path to wealth accumulation, retention, and transfer of assets. We do this by creating and implementing strategies tailored to the unique financial goals of each client. We are driven to provide clients with uncluttered, clear, professional advice to enhance their quality of life and lead them to a sustained, accountable investment solution. 


Our team consists of financial planners, portfolio managers, analysts, fixed income and equity traders, and retirement experts with over 100 years combined experience working with clients to help them plan and aim to maximize results with investable assets. Each one of our team members is here to add a layer of expertise and support by helping each client meet their needs both prior to and during retirement. 


Consistently ranked and awarded 30 national recognitions as a top independent financial advisor by the likes of Barrons, Forbes and Financial Times, Steven L. Thomas is the founder and managing principal of Linden Thomas and Company. The disciplined institutional approach that Linden Thomas has developed is focused on creating efficient portfolios that are designed to be a results-driven program coupled with world-class customer service.


To learn more about Linden Thomas and our process, visit https://lindenthomas.com.


Securities offered through Linden Thomas and Company Securities, LLC, member FINRA/SIPC. Advisory services offered through Linden Thomas Advisory Services, LLC, a SEC Registered Investment Advisor. Linden Thomas and Company Securities, LLC and Linden Thomas Advisory Services, LLC are affiliated entities.

description:
Barkley Risk Management & Insurance is one of the premier risk management consultants and insurance brokers in California. Founded in 1995, Barkley Insurance has evolved into the industry leader as measured by its client retention, quality and integrity of staff, community involvement, carrier relations, and relations in the marketplace.


We build relationships that go beyond the transactional level to develop an ideal workplace for our clients and their employees. By designing intelligent coverage structures, employee benefits, safety training, cultural development and proprietary programs we create the ideal risk management strategies for businesses throughout California. 


Weve been nominated as one of the Best Places to Work by the Pacific Coast Business Times multiple times and recently won 4th place out of 100 in 2018.

name: Roeding Insurance Group | a Houchens Industries, Inc. Company
description:
Roeding Insurance Group was founded in 1921 and is today one of the largest independently-owned insurance and financial services agencies in the Cincinnati Tri-State area and the state of Kentucky.


We represent top-rated insurance carriers and provide a diversity of insurance products from auto and home insurance, business insurance, employee benefits, and financial products, as well as being the largest independent agency provider for public entities in the state of Kentucky. 


What makes us different is our approach to insurance, finding the risks that will affect you, your business or your entity, and developing unique plans of action to cover those risks. We continually strive to create a comprehensive insurance plan that will meet our clients needs and preserve their peace of mind. 


We stress education and professional development with our staff to insure that you have the best people on your insurance team. We retain over 95% of our employees annually and our clients repay us by retaining our services by a 95% ratio year after year. 


Happy employees and satisfied customers are the key to our success. Contact us today and join our family of clients and experience the Roeding difference yourself.

name: Medical Mutual Insurance Company of Maine
description:
Founded in 1978 by a group of 12 physicians, Medical Mutual provides medical professional liability insurance to physicians, hospitals, nursing homes and allied health facilities in Maine, New Hampshire, Vermont and Massachusetts. The Company underwrites virtually all specialties, a long held principle aimed at providing stability for the medical communities the Company serves and to foster access to comprehensive care. 


The Company is committed to providing superior protection of its clients assets and reputations. Its flexible insurance programs feature innovative and unique coverage options for customized plan design. Its complimentary educational and risk management programs help reduce preventable medical errors and minimize systemic exposures. In addition, its standing Claims Committee, which is comprised of practicing physicians who understand the care environment and the value of a medical providers reputation, review all significant claims. 


As a mutual company, Medical Mutuals philosophy is to pay dividends in the form of premium credits when actual loss experience proves better than expected. The Company is committed to charging actuarially-indicated rates and, based on financial performance that has been historically strong by any standard metric, has declared 12 dividends since its founding, aggregating more than $33 million. Today, Medical Mutual insures 29 hospitals and approximately 3,000 physicians and enjoys an A.M. Best A-, or Excellent, rating.

name: Ibexis Life & Annuity Insurance Company
description:
Ibexis offers fixed annuities to help you protect your financial future and prepare for retirement. Our fixed annuities can help you accumulate money without risk of losing principal and provide guaranteed income during retirement. Since annuities are designed to help you save for retirement, they also provide certain tax advantages.


We are rated A- (Excellent) with a Stable outlook by A.M. Best for our financial strength, management expertise and enterprise risk management. Founded in 1899, A.M. Best is the worlds first credit rating agency and is the largest credit rating agency in the world specializing in the insurance industry.

name: Berkley Service Professionals (a Berkley Company)
description:
Our tagline is Better Solutions. 


What we mean by that is we roll-up our sleeves and sharpen our pencils while we analyze each risk for its unique characteristics and provide creative, responsive and comprehensive coverage options that meet the expectations of our brokers and their clients. In other words, we really analyze accounts and dont just apply the same cookie-cutter rules to every submission.


At our core, we are problem solvers. It is that simple.


Our talented senior management team has worked together for more than 25 years and have seen many changes in the economy and the insurance industry, so we understand the marketplace. We utilize our extensive experience, put on our forward-thinking caps and harness our passion for what we do to develop cutting-edge, customized coverage options that our brokers and their clients value and appreciate. We call these Better Solutions!

Berkley Corporation is an insurance holding company that is among the largest commercial lines writers in the United States and operated in two segments of the property casualty insurance business: Insurance and Reinsurance. name: NextCar Holding Company, Inc. (NXCR )
description:
We believe that you dont have to be owned by the machine to drive one. We believe in a way to subscribe to your next car that is debt-free and low commitment. And we believe that maintenance, insurance, and roadside assistance should be included in that one simple monthly payment. 


You can reserve your next car in as little as 10 minutes, drive it for as long as you want, and return it when you're done.


Our headquarters are in sunny Santa Monica, CA, but our mission is global. No matter where you might be right now, if challenge is your lifeblood, wed love to hear from you.

name: Rocky Mountain Mortgage Company
description:
Rocky Mountain Mortgage Company is a locally owned full service Mortgage Banking company. For the past 25 years we have been providing home loans to first time buyers, growing families, and people moving to El Paso. Our Construction Lending Department works with local developers and builders to assure availability of high quality affordable homes in El Paso. 


We have specially trained personnel to assist you and your family 7 days a week. Our Loan Originators, Assistants, and Processors will qualify you for a low down payment FHA, VA, Conventional home loan, or one of our many Community Home Buyer Programs. Our experience in the El Paso real estate market can work to your advantage whether this is your first home purchase, building your dream home or a transfer to El Paso. Our unique online prequalification program can speed up your home shopping process. Prequalified home buyers have a negotiating advantage when dealing with home sellers and working with Realtors.

name: David Insurance Agency, A Vizance Company
description:
Founded in 1950, David Insurance has served businesses and families in the Racine, Kenosha, and Sister Bay communities for the last 70+ years. In 2021, David Insurance joined Vizance to bring expanded services to their valued clients. With a shared attitude of caring partnership among associates and leadership and common corporate cultures, together David Insurance and Vizance are always moving forward to create the very best workplace for our associates and be the very best partner to our clients.


As a Vizance Company, were able to provide our clients additional levels of service  drawing upon our many resources to design and implement full-service business insurance, personal insurance, employee benefits, safety and risk management, claims management, wellness, compliance and financial solutions to suit their individual needs.

name: Trident Mortgage Company, LP NMLS# 111942
description: Trident Mortgage is dedicated to making homeownership a reality for all families. We offer many affordable housing options through our partnerships | Equal Housing Opportunity |NMLS ID 111942. State disclosure is on our website at www.tridentmortgage.com

name: The Glenview Trust Company
description:
Because Glenview Trust is a local, closely-held company with employee ownership, our professionals act and think differently. We are not accountable to a headquarters in a distant city, which allows us to effectively and efficiently accommodate our clients'_ unique situations. Because our trust professionals do not sell any proprietary products, we provide customized solutions that are in our client's best interest - not ours.


We know that effective wealth management is dynamic. No two strategies are the same at Glenview Trust. We offer custom wealth management solutions to fit your individual needs. Whether you are an individual investor, part of a family partnership, business owner, retiree or professional, our trusted experts can provide you with specialized wealth management solutions.

description: Please visit the website for verification.

name: Bassler & Company Insurance Agency
description:
Bassler & Co. Insurance Agency is a local independent insurance agent located in Northbrook, IL. We offer Northbrook and all surrounding areas: home insurance, life insurance, business insurance, and auto insurance.


Bassler & Co. is a full-service insurance agency that was founded in 1944 by Clarence J. Bassler, Jr. Today, our main goal still is: to provide you with personalized insurance coverage at prices you can afford. With nearly 70 years of experience and highly professional staff, we have the experience to fully understand all of your individual or business insurance needs.

name: Denning & Company
description:
Based in San Francisco and founded in 2001, Denning & Company is a leading boutique private equity advisory firm which provides consulting and fund raising services to both established and emerging private equity partnerships worldwide. We are attracted to challenging assignments.


With over 70 years of combined industry experience, we continually build upon our trusted relationships with top-tier General and Limited partners to create successful and enduring investment partnerships. We trust, respect and like the people with whom we choose to work.

name: Clark & Lavey Benefits Solutions, a Hilb Group Company
description:
Clark & Lavey has been an innovator in the employee benefits market space for more than twenty years, providing clients with effective, long-term solutions to meet their health plan needs. We work with clients to control their health plan spending and provide resources that play a critical role in their success, including best-in-class HR services for compliance, technology, employee development and retention, regulatory assistance, and much more. 


At Clark & Lavey, our dedicated team provides a wide array of impactful resources while maintaining the personalized attention of a small agency. Through the years, we have stayed true to that vision while collectively servicing over 10,000 employers and nearly 9 million employees, representing all major market segments. As a member of Hilb Group, Clark & Lavey provides the best of both worlds: local, personal service, and the national resources of a large broker.


Clark & Lavey's benefits professionals often find ways to facilitate pricing advantages that other firms miss, especially through our group health captive solution. InCap, Clark & Laveys proprietary group health captive, allows firms to band together in purchasing their employee health insurance, while still maintaining their individual control. There is safety in numbers, and the risk is spread across a much larger census, driving down renewal rates and reducing exposure to the disruption of big claims. Investment and underwriting profits are also returned to their bottom lines, a bonus unavailable to those in the fully-insured marketplace. 


The results have consistently been positive for InCap participants. In fact, one InCap participant had both lower renewal rates and received $368,848 back to its bottom line from the most-recent pool return of more than $1.5 million.


In today's fast-paced global environment, you have more challenges and demands on your time than ever before. Clark & Lavey has your benefits solutions.

name: Keystone National Insurance Company
description:
At Keystone National Insurance Company, our customers have always come first. In fact, it has been the highest degree of personal attention offered to our agents and our customers since our inception in 2005 that points to our success.


Our commitment to excellence has fueled our past, secured our present and strengthened our future.


It is our innovative and collaborative spirit that has propelled our continuous growth.


Keystone National Insurance Company is a division of Keystone Insurers Group, Inc.

name: RISCOM (Regional Insurance Services Company, LLC)
description:
We are a professional insurance underwriting management company specializing in Commercial Automobile, Commercial General Liability, Commercial Property, Inland Marine and Garage products. We consider every account individually and take a competitive but responsible approach to select the very best risks.

Come experience industry leading customer service from our carefully selected team. Our team is the best in the industry with superior local-knowledge and experience. We are a privately owned and operated organization representing stable domestic insurance carriers that specialize in Program Business.

name: North American Mortgage Company, an NTFN Company NMLS #75333
description:
North American Mortgage Co. is a full-service mortgage banker established in 1992 originally as Park Cities Mortgage. It was started by two men that felt they could create a better experience for their borrowers. They founded the company on the premise of excellent service, increased control and a faster more flexible process, all of which ultimately creates a first-class experience for everyone involved.




Having built a sterling reputation based on referrals from satisfied customers across the region, North American Mortgage Co. serves the lending needs of real estate professionals, builders, and individual homebuyers. With exceptional service and flexibility, North American Mortgage Co. stands above the competition. The combination of consistently competitive rates and the experience of a seasoned professional team help us qualify more borrowers and close more loans. We deliver the ultimate value and service to every customer, every time. We aim to represent the highest caliber principles, throughout all aspects of our business. The highest ethical purpose guides all of our actions. This mission is measured by quality, not quantity. 




As licensed mortgage bankers, we work with investors across the country. We offer personalized customer service, a variety of lending programs, and highly competitive rates to suit each customer's individual needs. We have stability, tenure and proven leadership, which assures our customers that all of our commitments will be met.

name: CM Vantage Specialty Insurance Company
description:
Headquartered in Madison, Wisconsin, CM Vantage is an excess and surplus lines insurance company specializing in underwriting unique exposures and providing innovative product solutions. We distribute products through select wholesale brokers and general agents.


Our team of experienced excess & surplus lines professionals work with our wholesale partners to provide a wide array of insurance products, including: primary casualty, excess casualty, primary property and excess property. We know that every day we need to earn the trust and support of our business partners and we are committed to exceeding their expectations in every way.

name: Benefit Design Specialists, Inc./An Alera Group Company
description:
Mission:
Our purpose is to provide optimal employee benefit solutions by focusing on the goals of our clients.


Objective:
Is to produce the highest level and quality of employee benefit services possible, while assisting our Employer groups in maximizing their Employee Benefit Plans on a cost effective basis. When reviewing a clients employee benefit package, we specialize in the design and implementation of Section 105, Section 125 and HSA plan options while providing one point of contact to an Employers HR, as well as employees for all administrative services. While Consumer Driven Health Care (CDHC) can initially be confusing to employees because of the necessity of employee involvement, BDS is dedicated to assisting employees in this transition.


Company History:
BDS began offering HR assistance and Cafeteria plan administrative services in 1993, then soon evolved into expanding their administrative services by offering COBRA, HRA and HSA services to clients. In 2003, BDS began to see convincing rate variances in higher deductible medical products and was the innovator of the MERP concept with CDHC plans in Central PA. BDS currently administers over 300 employer clients with the MERP Plan, HRA, COBRA, FSA and HSA plans.


Who We Are:
Benefit Design Specialists is a dynamic organization committed to providing innovative solutions to employee benefit needs.


What We Do:
BDS offers a range of services and products dedicated to a two-fold goal; delivering quality, cost-effective employee benefit plans coupled with hassle-free benefits management for our clients HR departments. We are employee benefit consultants with an expertise in group insurance analysis, design and implementation of tax-advantageous, cost saving employee benefit programs.

name: Kinney Pike Insurance, A OneDigital Company
description:
Kinney Pike is now a OneDigital Company! We specialize in commercial insurance, personal insurance & employee benefits throughout New England & beyond.


All of our locations are staffed with local professionals, ready to support your insurance needs. We believe that our clients come first, and we try to support our clients'_ businesses as a sign of our appreciation. We also are firm believers in supporting the community and do so through corporate donations, sponsorships, and volunteering our time in the community. 


With over 116 years of experience, a broad range of markets to choose from, and knowledgeable, local staff, we have the resources to better protect YOU.

name: Bailey & Company Benefits Group, an ALERA Group Company
description:
From mid-sized businesses to publicly traded companies, Bailey & Company Benefits Group provides an unmatched range of advisory services for employee benefit programs.


As an Alera Group company, Bailey & Company Benefits Group has access to the services, resources, technical expertise and best practices of a large national firm with a highly innovative culture. This coupled with our personalized, local relationships and knowledge of our unique regional characteristics, we are able to keep our clients on the leading edge of industry trends helping them to maximize the return on their employee benefits investment.


Alera Group's national scope includes more than 1,500 employees serving thousands of clients through more than 70 locations across the nation.

name: Dickinson Williams & Company
description: Dickinson Williams & Company is an independent investment banking firm led by industry veterans with over 80 years of combined investment banking, financing, and operating experience. The firm provides objective, experience-based advisory services to lower middle market companies with enterprise values typically up to $150 million. The firm provides sell-side, buy-side, private placement, recapitalization, and strategic advisory services to family and closely held businesses, corporations, and private equity groups, and has a broad cross-section of transaction and industry experience in the industrials, business services, distribution, healthcare, and consumer sectors.

name: Xcaret Company
description:
We consult with organizations and individual investors who wish to raise funds for humanitarian projects.
We consult with investors on private placement and high yield investment strategies.
We consult on the purchase and resale of medium-term notes.
We purchase and resell bank instruments including MTNs.


We're patient, persistent, knowledgeable, experienced, and resourceful.

name: Gruppo & Company
description:
Who We Are


GLC is a leading, independent advisory firm helping our clients with exceptional M&A, strategic advisory and private capital raising services.


Whats Important


Our mission is simple - securing stellar results for our clients while providing a painless, in fact down-right enjoyable, service experience


Where We Thrive


GLCs M&A clients come from both ends of the transaction experience. We represent sellers and buyers of companies, and users of capital and capital providers. We have broad distribution capabilities in the Private Capital Markets, with particular focus in Infrastructure Finance, private equity and debt capital. Our expertise lies in two core areas of the economy encompassing a wide spectrum of services-


Consumer- Digital and Offline
Technology and Data Services

For the past two decades, GLC has served as a trusted adviser to entrepreneurs, private equity firms, corporate boards and family business owners in transactions encompassing every segment of its core sectors.

name: Brawner & Company
description:
BRAWNER is a national real estate consulting firm specializing in repositioning, acquisition, rehabilitation and development of affordable multifamily housing. For over 25 years, weve been real estate strategists, leaders in developing affordable housing communities, and partners with the people behind them. 


Brawner was founded on the principle of building relationships to understand our clients goals. Through the years, weve established a network of industry resources, from attorneys, lenders and investors to property management firms, so that we can deliver our clients incomparable value. 


In the end, it is the overarching goal of Brawner to assist housing authorities and non-profits in evaluating assets, reducing dependency on governmental funding sources and broadening their affordable housing options.

name: Market Title Company
description:
FOR OVER 17 YEARS, MARKET TITLE HAS BEEN DEDICATED TO GIVING YOU THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE AND FASTEST TURNAROUND TIMES WITH INCREDIBLE ACCURACY.


Market Title was established in 2003 to provide exceptional title insurance coverage to our homeowners. We are dedicated to finding money saving credits for your title insurance premium if eligible and to finding solutions for any title issues that may arise.


As agents of Chicago Title, First American, and WFG National Title we are part of the largest and most financially secure title companies in the country.


Our goal is to make our part in each transaction seamless for the homebuyer, real estate agent, and closing attorney.

name: Colonial Mortgage Service Company of America
description:
Since 1992 Colonial has been a trusted local Lender in Commercial, Residential and Investment Loans. Colonial Mortgage is your mortgage purchase and refinancing specialist serving PA, NJ, VA and MD.


Mission:


Our primary goal remains to provide the quickest most efficient process in order to become your #1 Trusted Lender!


Description:


Colonial Mortgage is here to provide you with updates about the housing market, financial tips, and other information beneficial to the public. We welcome your comments, however if you are seeking customer service visit (colonialmort.com) or call us at 215-661-1200! We look forward to providing you with the quickest and most efficient loan process.




Colonial Mortgage Service Company of America, 418 Stump Road, Suite 100, Montgomeryville, PA 18936, NMLS#112851, (www.nmlsconsumeraccess.org) is an Equal Housing Lender and we fully comply with the Equal Credit Opportunity Act (ECOA) and all other Federal and State regulations. Applicants applying for credit from Colonial will never be denied on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, military status, marital status, age, or because you get public assistance. This is not a commitment to lend. Our products, rates, and services may not be available in all states and are subject to change without notice. All applications are subject to underwriting guidelines and approval. We are licensed in the following states: Delaware: Licensed by the Delaware Office of the State Bank Commissioner-Licensed Lender #012690, Maryland: Licensed by the Maryland Commissioner of Financial Regulation-Mortgage Lender License #06-20109, New Jersey: Licensed by the N.J. Department of Banking and Insurance-Residential Mortgage Lender License #112851, Pennsylvania: Licensed by the Pennsylvania Department of Banking and Securities-Mortgage Lender License #22633, Virginia: Licensed by the Virginia State Corporation Commission-Virginia Lender License #MC-5658

name: CPS Payment Services, a REPAY Company
description:
CPS Payments was acquired by REPAY, a leading provider of vertically-integrated payment solutions, in November 2020.


REPAY offers powerful, yet straightforward solutions to simplify the way businesses make payments. On day one, we can automate 100% of payments to vendors and suppliers regardless of their payment acceptance capabilities.
Integrated to a business' existing platform, we handle all aspects of outbound payments, electronically and automatically paying vendors using Virtual Cards or ACH.


REPAY is a public company listed on the Nasdaq Stock Market under the ticker symbol RPAY and has been a certified Great Place to Work since 2017. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, GA, and has offices in Bettendorf, IA; Chattanooga, TN; Chicago, IL; Dallas, TX; East Moline, IL; Fort Worth, TX; Mesa, AZ; Phoenix, AZ; Salt Lake City, UT; and Sarasota, FL. For more information, visit www.repay.com.

name: The Rockwood Company
description:
The Rockwood Company has been providing insurance services to it's clients since 1896. It is one of the largest privately owned Independent Insurance Agencies in northeastern Illinois. 


As an Independent Agency, we have relationships with dozens of insurance companies, allowing you to get the right price with the right service. Whether you have the ideal history preferred companies desire, or a not so perfect history, we find the right coverage, with the best company, at the best price for you.

name: Eagle Nationwide Mortgage Company
description: Representing an FDIC insured, national bank(based out Chaddsford, PA), Eagle is poised for growth specializing in FHA & other government lending programs. I have been a licensed mortgage banker for more than 10 years and have originated commercial & residential loans from California to Florida, specializing in purchases, as well as debt-consolidation programs. We can also be a one-stop shop for our clients, providing a full suite of financial services.

name: Atlanta Life Insurance Company
description: Atlanta Life Financial Group offers innovative, industry-first insurance coverage. We're proud of our rich history, and proud to help protect your bright future. #BHM #BlackHistory

name: DDA & Company
description:
DDA & Company is a corporate finance advisory boutique specialized in cross-border small and mid-cap transactions with offices in Europe and in the USA. 


We advise a broad range of clients on all aspects of their corporate finance needs including mergers and acquisitions.


DDA & Company : 


More than 120 deals completed in the last 10 years
Experts in international mid-market mergers and acquisitions
Specializing in deals valued between 5 and 100 million (EV)
Covering more than 8 industry sectors and 30 business activities
A team of 12 professionals based in Europe and the USA

name: Derby and Company, Inc.
description:
For over 25 years, we have been providing straightforward, insightful and personalized investment management and retirement planning to guide individuals and families in protecting and growing their wealth. As an independent business, Derby & Company brings together performance and partnership in managing assets and legacies through the generations. We take a measured, thoughtful approach to securing financial independence, building wealth and trust for the long-term.


YOUR LONG-TERM INDEPENDENCE, OUR INDEPENDENT APPROACH


INDEPENDENT & OBJECTIVE
Our approach is simple and direct. We make your goals our goals. As an independent investment advisor, we have the ability, and the freedom, to make decisions based on your best interests. We are objective in our planning and investing, transparent in our operations, and fee-based. We are not product-driven. Instead, we have the flexibility to choose from a wide breadth of investment options, allowing us to capture opportunities while minimizing risk.


STRAIGHTFORWARD & REALISTIC
Confident investing begins with clarity of direction. We therefore follow a direct approach, from assessment through planning and execution. To help reduce complexity and increase understanding, we translate your financial realities into uncomplicated and achievable plans. We also explain market trends, discuss risks and rewards, and review goals and progress to ensure clear, ongoing communication.


INTEGRATED & CONNECTED
Often financial goals go beyond traditional investment management to real estate, private placement or other opportunities. We work collaboratively with a broad network of hand-picked professionals to help ensure your plans are well-integrated to meet your needs.

name: Gulf States Insurance Company
description:
Gulf States Insurance is a Louisiana based Insurance company offering Homeowners, Dwelling and Flood Insurance Protection. Our program has been thoughtfully designed for the Louisiana market by an experienced team that specializes in Property and Casualty Insurance. This local experience has enabled Gulf States to offer competitive rates and coverages tailored for the Louisiana Community. Our products are available through our Independent Agent Partnerships.


Gulf States Insurance has been formed to respond to the need for competitive and diversified coverage options in the Louisiana community. Our promise is built on a solid foundation that starts at home. Much like the Great White Heron, we define home in all three elements: Water, Earth and Air. Finding comfort in each and all of these three elements provides an easy flow or transition through all phases in business and life. The Gulf States culture is comprised of Partnership, Versatility, Determination and Resourcefulness.

name: TMI TRUST COMPANY
description:
TMI TRUST COMPANY is an independent, full-service trust company providing innovative, customized trust and agency solutions for over 65 years.


TMI delivers its services across four interconnected product lines: Corporate Trust and Agency Services, Salem Trust Services, Faith-based Services, and Wealth and Retirement Services.


Corporate Trust and Agency Services at TMI executes Trustee services (trustee, successor trustee, collateral agent, custodian, and default administration), Escrow Agent services (escrow agent, paying agent, and settlement agent), and Loan Agent services (administration agent, loan agent, and collateral agent).


Salem Trust Company as a division of TMI Trust Company, is focused on delivering, with a personal touch, institutional asset custody to government retirement plans and institutional clients.


Our Faith-based Services performs as trustee and loan agent for tax-exempt, faith-based bonds and loans, funeral and cemetery trusts, real estate management and brokerage, bond default, and outsourced loan officer.


The Wealth and Retirement Services group has extensive knowledge of Investment Partnership and Family Office organizations, understanding key investment concerns, optimization of investment administration, and crucial
experience with regulatory and tax administration. It provides flexible and comprehensive custody solutions for institutions and public sector entities (specializing in alternative and illiquid assets) including those involved with 401ks and IRAs, as well as institutional quality investment solutions including asset allocation, individual equity and fixed income separate account
management, and customized investment solutions.

name: Zurich Insurance
description:
Zurich is a leading multi-line insurer that serves its customers in global and local markets.


With about 53,000 employees, it provides a wide range of property and casualty, and life insurance products and services in more than 210 countries and territories. Zurichs customers include individuals, small businesses, and mid-sized and large companies, as well as multinational corporations. The Group is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland, where it was founded in 1872.


ONE TEAM, ONE PURPOSE


We are Zurich, one global company, with one mission, one ambition, one set of shared values and a clear commitment to our stakeholders: our customers, our people, our shareholders, and the communities in which we live and work.


To find out more, follow us on Twitter: @Zurich, like us on Facebook: Zurich, subscribe on YouTube: Zurich Insurance Group, follow us on Instagram: zurichinsurance or visit our website: www.zurich.com


You can find Zurich's community guidelines on
https://www.zurich.com/social-media

name: Groupe Crdit Agricole
description:
Crdit Agricole Group is the leading financial partner to the French economy and one of the largest banking groups in Europe.


It is the leading retail bank in Europe as well as the first European asset manager, the first bancassurer in Europe and the third European player in project finance. Built on its strong cooperative and mutual roots, its 142 000 employees and the 31 000 directors of its Local and Regional Banks, Crdit Agricole Group is a responsible and responsive bank serving 51 million customers, 10.5 million mutual shareholders and 1.1 million individual shareholders.


Thanks to its universal customer-focused retail banking model  based on the cooperation between its retail banks and their related business lines , Crdit Agricole Group supports its customers projects in France and around the world: insurance, real estate, payments, asset management, leasing and factoring, consumer finance, corporate and investment banking. 


Crdit Agricole also stands out for its dynamic, innovative corporate social responsibility policy, for the benefit of the economy. This policy is based on a pragmatic approach which permeates across the Group and engages each employee.

name: Standard Chartered Bank
description:
We are a leading international banking group, with a presence in more than 60 of the worlds most dynamic markets. Our purpose is to drive commerce and prosperity through our unique diversity, and our heritage and values are expressed in our brand promise, Here for good.

Standard Chartered PLC is listed on the London and Hong Kong Stock Exchanges.

name: Nubank
description:
Nu was born in 2013 with the mission to fight complexity to empower people in their daily lives by reinventing financial services.


We are one of the worlds largest digital banking platforms, serving more than 70 million customers across Brazil, Mexico, and Colombia. 


As one of the leading technology companies in the world, Nu leverages proprietary technologies and innovative business practices to create new financial solutions and experiences for individuals and SMEs that are simple, intuitive, convenient, low-cost, empowering, and human. 


Guided by its mission, Nu is fostering access to financial services across Latin America.

name: UBS
description:
From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills  at UBS we believe that you should never stop growing and learning because life never stops teaching. We know that it's our people  with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests  who drive our ongoing success. 
Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact? Find out more at ubs.com/careers. 
UBS works with individuals, families, institutions, and corporations around the world to help answer some of life's questions  whether through award winning wealth management advisory, investment banking and asset management expertise, or private and corporate banking services in Switzerland*. 
With more than 71,000 colleagues around the world, we collaborate across all major financial centers in 50 countries**. Although we all come from different backgrounds and specializations, two things unite us: the conviction that were stronger together, and the will and curiosity to constantly innovate. Thats the key to us unlocking our full potential (and what we look for in everyone who joins us). Its also why were regularly recognized as an attractive employer.*


*Our awards https://www.ubs.com/awards
** As of 31 December 2020
Social Media Legal Terms: http://www.ubs.com/social-legal

name: ING
description: ING is a pioneer in digital banking and on the forefront being one of the most innovative banks in the world. As ING we have a clear purpose that represents our conviction of peoples potential. We dont judge, coach, or to tell people how to live their lives. However big or small, modest or grand, we empower people and businesses to realize their vision for a better future. We made the promise to make banking frictionless, removing barriers to progress, and make people confident in their financial decisions. As a global bank we have a huge opportunity  and responsibility  to make an impact for the better. We can play a role by financing change, sharing knowledge, and innovating. Being sustainable is in all the choices we makeas a lender, as a partner and through the services we offer our customers

name: SGS
description:
We are SGS  the worlds leading testing, inspection and certification company. We are recognized as the global benchmark for quality and integrity. Our 96,000 employees operate a network of 2,700 offices and laboratories, working together to enable a better, safer and more interconnected world.


Community Guidelines
Welcome to our LinkedIn page! SGS encourages all fans of this page to participate in the conversation through questions and comments. Any comments or activity arising from persons sharing or otherwise reproducing any communications published by SGS is not controlled or endorsed by SGS. 


We want to promote an informative and enjoyable environment within this community; we therefore ask that you post content that is both relevant and respectful and that you follow LinkedIn's Professional Community Guidelines; https://help.linkedin.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/34593/~/linkedin-professional-community-guidelines


Posts will be removed if they are: 
- Offensive, defamatory, discriminatory or obscene
- Fraudulent, deceptive or misleading
- In violation of any intellectual property rights
- In violation of any law or regulation
- Abusive, harassing, stalking, threatening or attacking others 
- Trolling or deliberate disruption of discussion
- Commercial solicitations or personal promotion
- Spam, link baiting or files containing viruses that could damage the operation of other peoples computers or mobile devices


Intellectual Property Statement
Except where expressly stated otherwise, all intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademarks, in any and all communications and materials in any form published by or on behalf of SGS are owned by SGS Socit Gnrale de Surveillance SA, Switzerland.

name: Generali
description:
Generali enables people to shape a safer and more sustainable future by caring for their lives and dreams.


The Generali Group is one of the most significant players in the global insurance and financial products market. The Group is leader in Italy and Assicurazioni Generali, founded in 1831 in Trieste, is the Group's Parent and principal operating Company. 


Characterised from the very outset by a strong international outlook and now present in more than 50 Countries, Generali has consolidated its position among the world's leading insurance operators, with significant market shares in western Europe - its main area of activity - and particularly in Germany, France, Austria, Spain, Switzerland and Central and Eastern Europe. 

The Group has - over the last decade - set up offices in the main markets of the Far East, among which India and China; in particular, in China, just after few years of operation, it has become the leader among the insurance companies with foreign equity interests.


Key figures:
- Were present in more than 50 countries
- We have over 71,000 employees 
- We manage over 500 bln assets 
- We have over  68 bln in gross written premiums
- were among the 50 smartest companies in the world according to MIT Technology Review

name: Chubb
description:
Chubb is the worlds largest publicly traded property and casualty insurance company. With operations in 54 countries and territories, Chubb provides commercial and personal property and casualty insurance, personal accident and supplemental health insurance, reinsurance and life insurance to a diverse group of clients. As an underwriting company, we assess, assume and manage risk with insight and discipline. We service and pay our claims fairly and promptly. The company is also defined by its extensive product and service offerings, broad distribution capabilities, exceptional financial strength and local operations globally. Parent company Chubb Limited is listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: CB) and is a component of the S&P 500 index. Chubb maintains executive offices in Zurich, New York, London, Paris and other locations, and employs 31,000 people worldwide. Additional information can be found at: chubb.com.


Read our Social Media Guidelines here: https://www.chubb.com/us-en/about-chubb/chubbs-social-media-guidelines.aspx


Notre section   propos  est galement disponible en franais, ici: https://www.chubb.com/ca-fr/about-chubb-in-canada/a-propos-de-chubb-au-canada.aspx

name: Revolut
description:
We are building the worlds first truly global financial superapp. In 2015, Revolut launched in the UK offering money transfer and exchange. Today, our 20 million customers around the world use dozens of Revoluts innovative products to make more than 250 million transactions a month. 


Across our personal and business accounts, we help customers improve their financial health, give them more control, and connect people seamlessly across the world.

name: Lloyds Banking Group
description:
Our purpose is Helping Britain Prosper. We do this by creating a more sustainable and inclusive future for people and businesses, shaping finance as a force for good.


We're part of an ever-changing industry and are currently on a journey to shape the financial services of the future, whilst supporting our customers changing needs.


The scale and reach of our Group means we can offer a broad range of opportunities to learn, grow and develop. Our values-led culture and approach to inclusion and diversity means we can all make a real difference together.

name: DBS Bank
description:
DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia with a presence in 19 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS is in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's "AA-" and "Aa1" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.


Recognised for its global leadership, DBS has been named Worlds Best Bank by Global Finance, Worlds Best Bank by Euromoney and Global Bank of the Year by The Banker. The bank is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, having been named Worlds Best Digital Bank by Euromoney and the worlds Most Innovative in Digital Banking by The Banker. In addition, DBS has been accorded the Safest Bank in Asia award by Global Finance for 14 consecutive years from 2009 to 2022.


DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the regions most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, as it banks the Asian way. Through the DBS Foundation, the bank creates impact beyond banking by supporting social enterprises: businesses with a double bottom-line of profit and social and/or environmental impact. DBS Foundation also gives back to society in various ways, including equipping communities with future-ready skills and building food resilience.


With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. For more information, please visit www.dbs.com

name: World Trade Organization
description:
The World Trade Organization (WTO) deals with the global rules of trade between nations. Its main function is to ensure that trade flows as smoothly, predictably and freely as possible. At its heart are the WTO agreements, negotiated by its members.


For updates on the latest news, meetings and events of the WTO, you can also follow us on:
Twitter - @WTO
Facebook - World Trade Organization
Instagram - worldtradeorganization

name: Creditas
description:
Every company knows what they do, but few know why they really exist.
Creditas mission is well-defined: to enable what fulfils people by unleashing the potential of their assets.


At the moment, we work with home equity, auto equity, private payroll-deducted personal loans, and vehicle financing. And were always researching innovative ways to help people reach new heights.


Limits isnt a word we like. Its our culture to go further, think differently, educate people, and grow exponentially.


Were a technology company focused on people. And thats what well always be. If you also have this energy, come chat with us.

name: LSEG (London Stock Exchange Group)
description:
LSEG (London Stock Exchange Group) is a diversified international markets infrastructure business earning our clients trust for over 300 years. That legacy of customer-focused excellence ensures that you can rely on our expertise in capital formation, intellectual property and risk and balance sheet management. 


As global leaders in financial indexing, benchmarking and analytic services, we offer unrivalled access to international capital markets. Our high-performance technology solutions enable companies worldwide to access funds for growth and development. And with our Data & Analytics, Capital Markets and Post Trade divisions, we provide a comprehensive, integrated suite of trusted financial market infrastructure services that help our customers pursueand achievetheir ambitions. 


You can count on our open access model for unparalleled partnership, flexibility, stability, and support across all of our businesses. Thats how we make a difference ensuring people can meet their potentialworldwide.

name: Accuity
description:
Accuity, now LexisNexis Risk Solutions, powers compliant and assured client transactions to help build an interconnected and trusted financial ecosystem. Our financial crime screening, payment services, and benefits compliance solutions help enable financial inclusion while identifying criminal activity and fraudulent players. With deep expertise and industry-leading data and analytics solutions from the Firco and Bankers Almanac brands, Accuity provides unmatched confidence, efficiency, and compliance for customers around the world. Part of RELX, a global provider of information-based analytics and decision tools for professional and business customers, Accuity has been delivering solutions to banks and businesses worldwide for 180 years.
Part of The RELX Group, one of the worlds leading business information and data providers, Accuity has been delivering solutions to banks and businesses worldwide for 180 years.

name: European Investment Bank (EIB)
description:
As the EU bank, we provide finance and expertise for sustainable investment projects that contribute to EU policy objectives and make a strong impact on peoples lives in Europe and beyond. 


The EU's bank


The EIB is the European Union's bank. We are the only bank owned by and representing the interests of the European Union Member States. We work closely with other EU institutions to implement EU policy.


A major player


As the largest multilateral borrower and lender by volume, we provide finance and expertise for sound and sustainable investment projects which contribute to furthering EU policy objectives. More than 90% of our activity is focused on Europe but we also implement the financial aspects of the EU's external and development policies.


Lending, blending and advising


Lending: The vast majority of our financing is through loans, but we also offer guarantees, microfinance, equity investment, etc.


Blending: Our support helps us unlock financing from other sources, particularly from the EU budget. This is blended together to form the full financing package. 


Advising: Lack of finance is often only one barrier to investment. We can help with administrative and project management capacity which facilitates investment implementation.

name: Virgin
description:
At Virgin, were all about creating unique customer experiences, challenging the status quo and championing people and the planet. For five decades, in five business sectors and on five continents, our purpose is to change business for good.

The home of Virgin is Virgin Management  supporting the Branson family and the growth of the Virgin brand by developing and nurturing valuable Virgin businesses around the world. Virgin Management works alongside all the different Virgin companies and their teams around the world. We have interests spanning travel & leisure, health & wellness, music & entertainment, telecoms & media, financial services and space. Each of those individual Virgin businesses has its own ways of working, but we are all united by a shared culture and purpose. _

Virgin Management also works alongside Virgin Unite, the non-profit foundation of the Virgin Group, and is home to Virgin Start Up, a not-for-profit organisation that delivers Start Up Loans, mentoring and other support to entrepreneurs in the UK.

name: Groupe BPCE
description:
Groupe BPCE, at the service of its customers and the French economy


Groupe BPCE pursues a full range of banking and insurance activities, working through its two major Banque Populaire and Caisse dEpargne cooperative banking networks and through its different subsidiaries.
